Product.Product_Name: Scarpa - Helix - 40 Hyper Blue
Product.Long_Description: The Scarpa Helix rock climbing shoe is a comfortable all-around shoe for beginner or intermediate climbers that delivers performance and comfort at a great price.

Product.Product_Name: La Sportiva - Tarantulace Womens - 34 Topaz/Red Plum
Product.Long_Description: For those in the market for a more forgiving fit, La Sportivas Tarantulace climbing shoes for women might be whats needed. Their supportive, asymmetrical shape, roomy toe box, and unlined leather upper will mitigate strain so you can climb longer in comfort. Its durable rubber heel and FriXion RS rubber are sticky and provided a powerful edging platform. Made for indoor and outdoor climbers alike, the Tarantulacell get you scaling projects with confidence after a quick pull of its lacing harness.

Product.Product_Name: La Sportiva - Finale Womens - 36.5 Clay/Topaz
Product.Long_Description: Excellent for all-day comfort and reliable performance, the Finale is a lace-up rock shoe that is equally capable in the gym or the crag.

Product.Product_Name: SCARPA - ORIGIN M - 42 - Covey/Black
Product.Long_Description: The starting point in your climbing career is of fundamental importance. It gives rise to the genetic building blocks that shapes your climbing life. The Origin offers a lush leather upper, giving a feeling of padded luxury that is rarely found in a shoe aimed at encouraging people to start climbing. The flat profile and relatively relaxed randing ease the climbers feet into a cocoon of comfort. The hook-and-loop closure keeps the foot snug and well positioned during use. The Origin introduces SCARPAs Vision rubber, a proprietary compound that is both sticky and resilient to all the conditions that new climbers feet will experience.

Product.Product_Name: SCARPA - ORIGIN M - 41 - Covey/Black
Product.Long_Description: The starting point in your climbing career is of fundamental importance. It gives rise to the genetic building blocks that shapes your climbing life. The Origin offers a lush leather upper, giving a feeling of padded luxury that is rarely found in a shoe aimed at encouraging people to start climbing. The flat profile and relatively relaxed randing ease the climbers feet into a cocoon of comfort. The hook-and-loop closure keeps the foot snug and well positioned during use. The Origin introduces SCARPAs Vision rubber, a proprietary compound that is both sticky and resilient to all the conditions that new climbers feet will experience.

Product.Product_Name: EVOLV - DEFY - 7 - Black/Gray
Product.Long_Description: Not only does the classic Evolv Defy have a fresh new look, but features an improved, more anatomical fit. The new high quality upper material, Synthratek VX, offers a soft but secure fit and is treated with a new anti-microbial mesh material to eliminate odor and the build-up of bacteria.

Product.Product_Name: LA SPORTIVA - NEPAL CUBE GTX MENS - 47 - Yellow
Product.Long_Description: The Nepal Cube GTX is a warm and technical mountaineering boot designed to provide a lightweight yet robust boot to tackle big peaks, mixed terrain, glacier travel and vertical ice. Offering features like the carbon tech honeycomb insole, an insulated comfort Gore-Tex membrane and a removable and adjustable tongue, the Nepal Cubes provides a secure and precise fit to optimize your objective.

Product.Product_Name: La Sportiva - Tarantulace Womens - 33 Topaz/Red Plum
Product.Long_Description: For those in the market for a more forgiving fit, La Sportivas Tarantulace climbing shoes for women might be whats needed. Their supportive, asymmetrical shape, roomy toe box, and unlined leather upper will mitigate strain so you can climb longer in comfort. Its durable rubber heel and FriXion RS rubber are sticky and provided a powerful edging platform. Made for indoor and outdoor climbers alike, the Tarantulacell get you scaling projects with confidence after a quick pull of its lacing harness.

Product.Product_Name: Salewa - Womens Rapace GTX - 9 Shaded Spruce/Sulphur Spring
Product.Long_Description: The Rapace GTX is a lightweight mountaineering boot that teams a hard-wearing nubuck and fabric upper with waterproof and breathable GORE-TEX protection.

Product.Product_Name: EVOLV - ELEKTRA - 9.5 - Merlot/Gray
Product.Long_Description: The Elektra is one of the best selling low-volume climbing shoes in the world. Anatomical fit that is great for beginners and advanced climbers coupled with great looks make it a no-brainer for a first time or repeat buyer. The Synthratek VX upper and Agion Antimicrobial liner ensure lasting comfort and odor protection. The Split tongue and dual hook and loop closure system provide easy accessibility and a secure fit.

Product.Product_Name: SCARPA - INSTINCT VS W - 37 - Black/Aqua
Product.Long_Description: Combining a curved, asymmetrical last with a slightly softer construction and thinner sole for enhanced flexibility and sensitivity, the Instinct VS is the cornerstone of Scarpas Performance linean all-around shoe that handles a variety of styles at the highest level.

Product.Product_Name: Scarpa - Quantic Wmn - 36 Dust Grey/Black
Product.Long_Description: The new Quantic was designed for climbers who are looking for a comfortable shoe that performs across a wide spectrum of climbing disciplines. The slightly downturned shape with a medium-to-high angled toe box is paired with flexan insert plus HT-Tension to create a shoe that is extremely versatile. The Quantic combines a soft adaptable upper with a full-length outsole providing a solid platform for excellent edging ability. At home in either the gym or on rock, the Quantic is a perfect choice for climbers that demand a shoe for all modern climbing disciplines and classic multi pitch routes as well. The Womens model shares all of the features of the Mens version but with a slightly lower volume fit. The Quantic is surprisingly comfortable for a performance climbing shoe!

Product.Product_Name: Scarpa - Instinct VSR - 37.5 - Black Azure
Product.Long_Description: Those looking for a mens performance rock climbing shoe that really sings while bouldering and sport climbing ought to take a close look at the Scarpa Instinct VSR. When slipping into the VSRs youll notice a supple fit and sensitive feel, the likes of which grips nuanced terrain thanks to Vibram XS Grip2 rubber soles. Part of this feel also comes courtesy of the Bi-Tension system: tensioned rubber running underfoot from toe tips to alongside your feet on both sides of the shoe. And the rubber toe patch comes in clutch for toe hooks. The VSRs are perfectly suited to lighter climbers and will excel across a spectrum of hard climbing.

Product.Product_Name: LA SPORTIVA - ARAGON WOMENS - 36 - Clayhibiscus
Product.Long_Description: A climbing shoe with double hook & loop closure fastening, ideal for beginners and for all climbers who need a product that is comfortable and quick to put on. Perfect for use on indoor climbing walls.

Product.Product_Name: LA SPORTIVA - NEPAL CUBE GTX MENS - 43 - Yellow
Product.Long_Description: The Nepal Cube GTX is a warm and technical mountaineering boot designed to provide a lightweight yet robust boot to tackle big peaks, mixed terrain, glacier travel and vertical ice. Offering features like the carbon tech honeycomb insole, an insulated comfort Gore-Tex membrane and a removable and adjustable tongue, the Nepal Cubes provides a secure and precise fit to optimize your objective.

Product.Product_Name: La Sportiva - Tarantula - 49 Black/Poppy
Product.Long_Description: The La Sportiva Tarantula climbing shoes will get you scaling projects like its namesake, without all the extra appendages. Climbers will enjoy the comfortable fit and performance of its unlined asymmetrical shape and ultra-thin synthetic fiber-laminate midsole that provide torsional support for various foot shapes. That way, indoors or outdoors, you can tackle steep routes and execute tricky moves with confidence. Easy to use and slip on or off, the Tarantulas an easy decision for beginners and seasoned climbers alike.

Product.Product_Name: Tenaya - Oasi LV - 2
Product.Long_Description: The popularity of the award-winning Oasi and the demand for a lower volume version led Tenaya to design this new edition. The Oasi LV maintains all of the key features of the original Oasi in a lower volume package. It will radically change how you think about high performance climbing shoes. Its down-turn and down-camber are ideally suited on steep climbs, but you will immediately notice the edging and smearing performance as well a true distinction. The 3.5mm Vibram XS Grip outsole and highly sensitive midsole make the Oasi LV feel like an extension of your foot rather than a box around it, and the comfort is unparalleled. The two straps utilize Draxtor Technology to provide a fine tuned fit. You can expect consistent performance throughout the life of the shoe, thanks to the synthetic upper and cotton lining.

Product.Product_Name: La Sportiva - Tarantula - 45.5 Black/Poppy
Product.Long_Description: The La Sportiva Tarantula climbing shoes will get you scaling projects like its namesake, without all the extra appendages. Climbers will enjoy the comfortable fit and performance of its unlined asymmetrical shape and ultra-thin synthetic fiber-laminate midsole that provide torsional support for various foot shapes. That way, indoors or outdoors, you can tackle steep routes and execute tricky moves with confidence. Offering features like the carbon tech honeycomb insole, an insulated comfort Gore-Tex membrane and a removable and adjustable tongue, the Nepal Cubes provides a secure and precise fit to optimize your objective.
Product.Google_Categorization: Apparel & Accessories > Shoes > Outdoor Shoes > Hiking Shoes

Product.Product_Name: La Sportiva - Tarantula Boulder Womens - 38 Ice/Crystal
Product.Long_Description: Focus on more complex moves, not painful feet. The womens La Sportiva Tarantula Boulder climbing shoes increase durability, sensitivity and dynamic performance while keeping the fit comfortable.

Product.Product_Name: Scarpa - Instinct - 39.5 - Black Orange
Product.Long_Description: Climbers who want one shoe for all styles of climbing will favor Scarpas performance-oriented Instinct collection. A classic shoe reinvigorated the updated Instinct lace still offers a performance fit on a curved, asymmetric last, but now with a micro suede synthetic upper and a welded overlay. Performance is enhanced with a high degree of pre-stored power in the Bi-Tension Active Rand, which pulls the sole up and back onto the forefoot giving an extremely precise, low profile fit. The award winning Instinct VS heel is now incorporated into the 2016 lace version.

Product.Product_Name: Scarpa - Helix Womens - 37 Mandarin Red
Product.Long_Description: Comfortable, durable and undeniably classic, the flat-lasted Helix combines elemental yet refined features to yield one of Scarpas most popular shoes. With a highly adjustable lace-up construction, padded tongue and relatively symmetrical profile, the Helix is perfect for guides, advancing climbers and anyone prioritizing all-day comfort.

Product.Product_Name: La Sportiva - Tarantula Boulder - 44.5 Metal/Sunset
Product.Long_Description: The best-selling Tarantula climbing shoe is reinvigorated with additional features to help beginner climbers focus on bouldering and more complex climbing movements. Additional Toe Rubber increases durability and Toe-hooking capabilities, and an updated heel helps facilitate heel hooking. User profile: For beginners looking to engage and excel quickly, this responsive and unstructured shoe now offers additional technology to help facilitate advanced movements and techniques.

Product.Product_Name: La Sportiva - TC Pro - 35.5 Olive
Product.Long_Description: Footwear fit for the likes of Tommy Caldwell and Alex Honnold, the La Sportiva TC Pros a rock climbing shoe thats only become more improved over time. Climbers will utilize the same construction thats left a legacy on routes like Freerider and Dawn Wall. Its made with big-picture projects in mind. TCs stiff construction makes it a powerhouse and crack and edge climbing. Not to mention its much more robust in the face of wear and tear. If feet need to be shoved into cracks, so be it! Its ankle protection is also strategically designed to keep your foot movement from being impeded. Take your climbing to new heights with the TC Pro.

Product.Product_Name: LA SPORTIVA - NEPAL CUBE GTX MENS - 43.5 - Yellow
Product.Long_Description: The Nepal Cube GTX is a warm and technical mountaineering boot designed to provide a lightweight yet robust boot to tackle big peaks, mixed terrain, glacier travel and vertical ice. Offering features like the carbon tech honeycomb insole, an insulated comfort Gore-Tex membrane and a removable and adjustable tongue, the Nepal Cubes provides a secure and precise fit to optimize your objective.

Product.Product_Name: La Sportiva - Tarantulace - 43.5 Olive/Tiger
Product.Long_Description: The TarantuLace is an unlined leather climbing shoe with asymmetric shape for advanced performance. The RN45 shoe shape is great for upper end performance without hurting your toes. The synthetic leather overlay lacing harness adds great support for entry to mid level climbers and the unlined leather is comfortable and soft. The aggressive rubber heel rand lets you stand in micro edges and the FriXion RS rubber is hard wearing yet sticky for long life. This is great shoe for gym climbers and outdoor climbers that need a one-quiver shoe that does it all.

Product.Long_Description: Featuring a highly breathable, stretch-knit upper combined with a microfiber footbed wrapping the big toe, the Reflex V has been designed with comfort, performance, and affordability in mind. Product.Product_Name: SCARPA - VAPOR V WOMENS - 35 - Dahlia/Aqua
Product.Long_Description: The Scarpa Vapor V is perfect for the climber needing that performance edge out of changing terrain. From slabs to steep, this climbing shoe hooks and claws down on overhanging terrain. The Vapor Vs synthetic upper holds its shape when you use it while the leatherback molds to the shape of your heel, great for all day use. The womens specific fit of the Vapor V from Scarpa has a narrower last in the heel and a lower volume in the forefoot. A great climbing shoe for any climber who has a smaller and lower volume foot but is also looking for that performance quality Scarpa brings to all their climbing shoes Not sure if these are for you? Check out How to Choose Rock Climbing Shoes to see if the Scarpa Vapor Vs have what you need from your next climbing shoe.

Product.Long_Description: The La Sportiva Tarantula climbing shoes will get you scaling projects like its namesake, without all the extra appendages. That way, indoors or outdoors, you can tackle steep routes and execute tricky moves with confidence. Easy to use and slip on or off, the Tarantulas an easy decision for beginners and seasoned climbers alike.

Product.Product_Name: EVOLV - SHAMAN CLIMBING SHOE - 4.5 - Blue/Orange
Product.Long_Description: Building off the legacy of the original, the newly redesigned Shaman has an improved fit in terms of engineered comfort and performance with more toe rubber for toe hooking and an inset front strap for better medial side toe scumming. The Love Bump and Knuckle Box Technology creates the perfect downturned toe fit for powerful edging, pulling and toe hooking. Enjoy the legendary performance with next-level comfort.

Product.Product_Name: LA SPORTIVA - ARAGON MENS - 46.5 - Clayjasminegreen
Product.Long_Description: A climbing shoe with double hook & loop closure fastening, ideal for beginners and for all climbers who need a product that is comfortable and quick to put on. Perfect for use on indoor climbing walls.

Product.Product_Name: BLACK DIAMOND - ZONE LV CLIMBING SHOES - 5.5 - Octane
Product.Long_Description: The Zone LV is a two-strap Velcro shoe that combines the award-winning comfort and breathability of Black Diamonds Momentum climbing shoes, with the high-performance last of their Shadows to create a shoe built for sending at the gym or the crag. The Zones upper consist of their Engineered Knit Technology, which provides stretch where you need it, support where it matters and all around exceptional breathability-meaning you can go hard at the gym without worrying about your feet overheating. The shoes last is downturned and based on BDs aggressive shape, making the Zone adept at pulling hard on steep rock or plastic. The Zones sticky Fuze rubber is molded inspired by the way they forge their carabiners and not cut from one sheet of rubber. This is their engineered solution to optimize their shoes rubber and rands for consistency and comfort. The shoes vamp area also has printed rubber for extra friction while toe-hooking, and the medium-flex midsole adds a balance of sensitivity and power. For hard training sessions, this is the Zone you want to be in.

Product.Product_Name: EVOLV - ZENIST W - 9 - White/Teal/Black
Product.Long_Description: The Zenist was designed for the competition climber that has a lower volume and narrower foot and who needs the most feedback from their shoes during precise foot placements and delicate heel & toe hooks. The vegan synthetic upper built on an aggressively profiled last will ensure your foot is always in a power position and that the shoe will not stretch too much over time. The midsole featured in the Zenist is a rubber midsole that provides just the right amount of rigidity without sacrificing the sensitivity. When winning the competition is on the line feedback from your shoes can mean the difference between winning and competing.

Product.Product_Name: La Sportiva - Tarantula Womens - 40 Red Plum
Product.Long_Description: This comfortable shoe is easy to use and easy to get on and off in a flash. The unlined upper is excellent for moisture management and super comfortable on your foot all day. The shape is round and higher volume for the climber not looking to mangle their feet yet aggressive enough to perform when needed. The highly adjustable closure system adapts to multiple foot types and shapes.

Product.Long_Description: The Shaman LV from Evolv is an aggressive climbing shoe for overhanging sport climbs, bouldering, and technical face climbing, with a last that will fit men or women with low to medium volume in the forefoot and heel. Product.Product_Name: LA SPORTIVA - MIURA - 45 - Lime
Product.Long_Description: In the line for over 10 years, the Miura is the perfect tool for performance footwork whether it be on slabs, vertical or overhanging steep rock. The high tensioned Slingshot Rand is tied into the Powerhinge on the sole so that when small edges are weighted the shoe stretches in the back half of the shoe and not in the front. This allows you to stick on the smallest edges you can find or imagine! The multi-paneled lining gives you the perfect fit and the speed lacing system laces up in a cinch.

Product.Product_Name: LA SPORTIVA - MIURA WOMENS - 40.5 - White Jade Green

Product.Product_Name: Scarpa - Vapor Lace - 37
Product.Long_Description: Critically acclaimed and award winning, Scarpas Vapor family is a perfect way to breathe new life into your climbing day. Quite often, improving climbers dont want to stray too far from tried and tested shoes, but increasingly they want to experiment on different types of terrain. SCARPA appreciates the opportunities that alternative versions of shoes with similar basic designs can unlock. The single piece synthetic upper promotes a new concept in comfort, and minimal stitching eliminates hot spots. The full length outsole and increased stiffness are matched with Vibram XS Edge rubber to offer the most supportive lace up in the entire climbing collection. The Vapor lace is built on the same last and utilizes the same Active Rand as the Vapor V, complimenting its softer relative extremely well

Product.Long_Description: The starting point in your climbing career is of fundamental importance. It gives rise to the genetic building blocks that shape your climbing life. The Origin offers a lush leather upper, giving a feeling of padded luxury that is rarely found in a shoe aimed at encouraging people to start climbing. The flat profile and relatively relaxed randing ease the climbers feet into a cocoon of comfort. The hook-and-loop closure keeps the foot snug and well positioned during use. The Origin introduces SCARPAs Vision rubber, a proprietary compound that is both sticky and resilient to all the conditions that new climbers feet will experience.

Product.Product_Name: La Sportiva - Tarantula Womens - 41 Red Plum
Product.Long_Description: This comfortable shoe is easy to use and easy to get on and off in a flash. The unlined upper is excellent for moisture management and super comfortable on your foot all day. The shape is round and higher volume for the climber not looking to mangle their feet yet aggressive enough to perform when needed. The highly adjustable closure system adapts to multiple foot types and shapes.

Product.Product_Name: SCARPA - ORIGIN M - 41.5 - Covey/Black

Product.Product_Name: La Sportiva - Tarantulace - 37.5 Olive/Tiger
Product.Long_Description: The TarantuLace is an unlined leather climbing shoe with asymmetric shape for advanced performance. The RN45 shoe shape is great for upper end performance without hurting your toes. The synthetic leather overlay lacing harness adds great support for entry to mid level climbers and the unlined leather is comfortable and soft. The aggressive rubber heel rand lets you stand in micro edges and the FriXion RS rubber is hard wearing yet sticky for long life. This is great shoe for gym climbers and outdoor climbers that need a one-quiver shoe that does it all.

Product.Product_Name: TENAYA - TANTA SHOES - 6
Product.Long_Description: Created with Tenayas new M4 technology, the Tanta features exceptional comfort and many qualities of their highest performance climbing shoes. Neither too stiff nor too soft, slightly curved, with glove-like fit and dynamic response, the Tanta performs great in all kinds of situations. Expect the Tanta to make your climbing feel easier and more intuitive, leading your footwork to flow in a natural and precise way. The Tanta is the perfect training companion for logging vertical mileage at the climbing gym.

Product.Product_Name: LA SPORTIVA - ARAGON MENS - 38 - Clayjasminegreen
Product.Long_Description: A climbing shoe with double hook & loop closure fastening, ideal for beginners and for all climbers who need a product that is comfortable and quick to put on. Perfect for use on indoor climbing walls.

Product.Product_Name: La Sportiva - Tarantulace - 42.5 Olive/Tiger
Product.Long_Description: The TarantuLace is an unlined leather climbing shoe with asymmetric shape for advanced performance. Product.Product_Name: Evolv - Shaman Pro LV - 13 Black/Beet Red
Product.Long_Description: New to the 2023 Evolv Lab family, the Shaman Pro Low Volume introduces an entirely new way of thinking about climbing shoe design. Say goodbye to painful downsizing to optimize performance: Evolvs new Wrap technology holds the foot securely around the instep, eliminating the need to painfully pressure your toes into the front of the shoe. The Shaman Pro LV fits just like their best-selling Shaman Lace LV and Shaman Strap LV, but is a softer, more sensitive model for comp-style bouldering and lead routes. A very thin love bump midsole combined with our new Wrap technology yields a super-sensitive shoe that can smear on any angle and has enough stiffness under the toes to power off tiny chips, for a comfortable and powerful fit right out of the box.

Product.Product_Name: La Sportiva - Tarantula Womens - 39 Red Plum
Product.Long_Description: This comfortable shoe is easy to use and easy to get on and off in a flash. Product.Long_Description: Focus on more complex moves, not painful feet. The womens La Sportiva Tarantula Boulder climbing shoes increase durability, sensitivity and dynamic performance while keeping the fit comfortable.

Product.Product_Name: La Sportiva - Tarantula Boulder - 50 Metal/Sunset
Product.Long_Description: The best-selling Tarantula climbing shoe is reinvigorated with additional features to help beginner climbers focus on bouldering and more complex climbing movements. User profile: For beginners looking to engage and excel quickly, this responsive and unstructured shoe now offers additional technology to help facilitate advanced movements and techniques.

Product.Product_Name: La Sportiva - Otaki - 36.5 - Blue Flame
Product.Long_Description: La Sportivas Otaki climbing shoe is an all-around, aggressive climbing shoe that aims for performance and percision on all terrain.The sole is quite stiff to provide maximum power transfer and the toe box features a high degree of asymmetry. The P3 tech will keep the shoes down turned even after many sessions on rock and in the gym.
Product.Google_Categorization: Apparel & Accessories > Shoes > Outdoor Shoes > Climbing Shoes

Product.Product_Name: LA SPORTIVA - NEPAL CUBE GTX MENS - 42 - Yellow
Product.Long_Description: The Nepal Cube GTX is a warm and technical mountaineering boot designed to provide a lightweight yet robust boot to tackle big peaks, mixed terrain, glacier travel and vertical ice. Offering features like the carbon tech honeycomb insole, an insulated comfort Gore-Tex membrane and a removable and adjustable tongue, the Nepal Cubes provides a secure and precise fit to optimize your objective.

Product.Product_Name: Scarpa - Quantic - 41 Dust Grey/Mango
Product.Long_Description: The new Quantic was designed for climbers who are looking for a comfortable shoe that performs across a wide spectrum of climbing disciplines. The slightly downturned shape with a medium-to-high angled toe box is paired with flexan insert plus HT-Tension to create a shoe that is extremely versatile. The Quantic combines a soft adaptable upper with a full-length outsole providing a solid platform for excellent edging ability. At home in either the gym or on rock, the Quantic is a perfect choice for climbers that demand a shoe for all modern climbing disciplines and classic multi pitch routes as well. The Mens model shares all of the features of the Womens version but with a slightly more generous fit. The Quantic is surprisingly comfortable for a performance climbing shoe!

Product.Product_Name: La Sportiva - Tarantula Boulder - 49.5 Metal/Sunset
Product.Long_Description: The best-selling Tarantula climbing shoe is reinvigorated with additional features to help beginner climbers focus on bouldering and more complex climbing movements. Additional Toe Rubber increases durability and Toe-hooking capabilities, and an updated heel helps facilitate heel hooking. User profile: For beginners looking to engage and excel quickly, this responsive and unstructured shoe now offers additional technology to help facilitate advanced movements and techniques.

Product.Product_Name: SCARPA - VAPOR V MENS - 40.5 - Ocean/Yellow
Product.Long_Description: The Scarpa Vapor V is perfect for the climber needing that performance edge out of changing terrain. From slabs to steep, this climbing shoe hooks and claws down on overhanging terrain. The Vapor Vs synthetic upper holds its shape when you use it while the leatherback molds to the shape of your heel, great for all day use. The womens specific fit of the Vapor V from Scarpa has a narrower last in the heel and a lower volume in the forefoot. A great climbing shoe for any climber who has a smaller and lower volume foot but is also looking for that performance quality Scarpa brings to all their climbing shoes Not sure if these are for you? Check out How to Choose Rock Climbing Shoes to see if the Scarpa Vapor Vs have what you need from your next climbing shoe.

Product.Product_Name: La Sportiva - Tarantula - 38.5 Black/Poppy
Product.Long_Description: The La Sportiva Tarantula climbing shoes will get you scaling projects like its namesake, without all the extra appendages. Climbers will enjoy the comfortable fit and performance of its unlined asymmetrical shape and ultra-thin synthetic fiber-laminate midsole that provide torsional support for various foot shapes. That way, indoors or outdoors, you can tackle steep routes and execute tricky moves with confidence. Easy to use and slip on or off, the Tarantulas an easy decision for beginners and seasoned climbers alike.

Product.Product_Name: La Sportiva - Trango S Evo GTX - 39 Light Blue
Product.Long_Description: The La Sportiva Womens Trango S EVO GTX Mountaineering Boot features the weather protection of Gore-Tex and the low weight you demand in the mountains. Product.Product_Name: BLACK DIAMOND - MOMENTUM LACE WOMENS - 5.5 - Ash
Product.Long_Description: Step into the realm of vertical mastery with the Black Diamond Momentum Lace a climbing shoe designed to empower female climbers with unparalleled precision and comfort. Crafted with meticulous attention to detail, this shoe is a true game-changer for those seeking to push their limits on the rock. The Momentum Lace features a women-specific design, ensuring an optimal fit and performance. Its versatile lace-up system allows for a personalized and secure fit, while the breathable engineered knit upper keeps your feet comfortable during intense climbing sessions. With a medium stiffness and 4.3mm NeoFriction rubber outsole, this shoe strikes the perfect balance between sensitivity and durability. Experience enhanced grip and traction on a variety of surfaces, enabling you to confidently tackle any route that comes your way. Whether youre a beginner honing your skills or a seasoned climber seeking new challenges, the Black Diamond Momentum Lace is your ultimate companion. Equip yourself with this climbing essential and elevate your vertical journey to new heights. Unleash your full potential and embrace the adventure that awaits. These shoes run small our climbing experts recommend up to one size above your street size. If you have any questions about sizing, please contact us via LiveChat or call 888-547-4327.

Product.Product_Name: BLACK DIAMOND - ZONE CLIMBING SHOES - 7.5 - Aluminum
Product.Long_Description: The Zone is a two-strap Velcro shoe that combines the award-winning comfort and breathability of Black Diamonds Momentum climbing shoes, with the high-performance last of their Shadows to create a shoe built for sending at the gym or the crag. The Zones upper consist of their Engineered Knit Technology, which provides stretch where you need it, support where it matters and all around exceptional breathability-meaning you can go hard at the gym without worrying about your feet overheating. The shoes last is downturned and based on BDs aggressive shape, making the Zone adept at pulling hard on steep rock or plastic. The Zones sticky Fuze rubber is molded inspired by the way they forge their carabiners and not cut from one sheet of rubber. This is BDs engineered solution to optimize their shoes rubber and rands for consistency and comfort. The shoes vamp area also has printed rubber for extra friction while toe-hooking, and the medium-flex midsole adds a balance of sensitivity and power. For hard training sessions, this is the Zone you want to be in.

Product.Product_Name: La Sportiva - Kubo Womens - 33 Regular Royal/Love Potion
Product.Long_Description: La Sportivas Womens Kubo is a versatile climbing shoe dedicated to indoor climbing both boulder and lead, ideal for those looking for comfort and versatility. Innovation is represented by the newly constructed heel which is integrated into the sole for better grip and greater protection as well as for an accentuated elasticity and overall sensitivity. Kubo provides excellent comfort thanks to the unlined uppers in microfiber and suede. It also facilitates the customization of volumes quickly and precisely thanks to the double opposing strap closure. The toe cap is integrated into the toe edge to protect against abrasions and the construction of the sole is designed to allow resoling.

Product.Product_Name: SCARPA - INSTINCT SR - 35.5 - Tonic
Product.Long_Description: The Instinct SR is designed with indoor climbing in mind. The large rubber cover above the toe area enables powerful toe-hooking. Integral heel cup for sensitive heel-hooking, slightly asymmetrical and downturned shape, with a medium angled toe box.

Product.Product_Name: EVOLV - DEFY LACE M - 12 - Fog Gray/Banana
Product.Long_Description: The Defy Lace was designed for the climber that has comfort and all-around moderate performance in mind. The single layer leather, which features a semi perforated upper, allows the shoe to melt and mold to your foot giving that custom fit, while ensuring that the shoe does not lose structure; the perforations do not actually penetrate the upper. The 3/4 length speed lace closure will ensure that you can sinch the shoe up quickly when you need to add a little more performance and drive some extra power to your toes. The 1.2 mm full-length midsole paired with a slightly asymmetric toe profile will give you a sturdy enough platform to edge on vertical faces or provide enough confidence for your off vertical endeavors.

Product.Product_Name: La Sportiva - Katana Lace Womens - 34 White/Black
Product.Long_Description: Those with a sharp eye for tiny footholds can make good use of the La Sportiva Katana Lace. A rock climbing shoe thatll help you place toes onto small edges and hook into pockets. This comes courtesy of its thin heel, downward turn, and asymmetrical shape. The womens version is softer and boasts a half-length outsole for easy flex. That way you can maximize friction and lend greater freedom of movement to the foot. And despite the shape, they stay comfortable throughout the day. Climbers can expect all the friction and accuracy they need while twisting into thin cracks and scaling slabs while wearing the Katana Lace.

The Love Bump and Knuckle Box Technology creates the perfect downturned toe fit for powerful edging, pulling and toe hooking. Enjoy the legendary performance with next-level comfort.

The flat profile and relatively relaxed randing ease the climbers feet into a cocoon of comfort. The hook-and-loop closure keeps the foot snug and well positioned during use. The Origin introduces SCARPAs Vision rubber, a proprietary compound that is both sticky and resilient to all the conditions that new climbers feet will experience.

Product.Product_Name: La Sportiva - Otaki - 37 - Blue Flame
Product.Long_Description: La Sportivas Otaki climbing shoe is an all-around, aggressive climbing shoe that aims for performance and percision on all terrain.The sole is quite stiff to provide maximum power transfer and the toe box features a high degree of asymmetry. The P3 tech will keep the shoes down turned even after many sessions on rock and in the gym.
Product.Google_Categorization: Apparel & Accessories > Shoes > Outdoor Shoes > Climbing Shoes

Product.Product_Name: Salewa - Womens Rapace GTX - 10.5 Shaded Spruce/Sulphur Spring
Product.Long_Description: The Rapace GTX is a lightweight mountaineering boot that teams a hard-wearing nubuck and fabric upper with waterproof and breathable GORE-TEX protection.

Product.Product_Name: EVOLV - SHAMAN CLIMBING SHOE - 4 - Blue/Orange
Product.Long_Description: Building off the legacy of the original, the newly redesigned Shaman has an improved fit in terms of engineered comfort and performance with more toe rubber for toe hooking and an inset front strap for better medial side toe scumming. The Love Bump and Knuckle Box Technology creates the perfect downturned toe fit for powerful edging, pulling and toe hooking. Enjoy the legendary performance with next-level comfort.

Product.Product_Name: Scarpa - Instinct VSR - 38 - Black Azure
Product.Long_Description: Those looking for a mens performance rock climbing shoe that really sings while bouldering and sport climbing ought to take a close look at the Scarpa Instinct VSR. When slipping into the VSRs youll notice a supple fit and sensitive feel, the likes of which grips nuanced terrain thanks to Vibram XS Grip2 rubber soles. Part of this feel also comes courtesy of the Bi-Tension system: tensioned rubber running underfoot from toe tips to alongside your feet on both sides of the shoe. And the rubber toe patch comes in clutch for toe hooks. The VSRs are perfectly suited to lighter climbers and will excel across a spectrum of hard climbing.

Product.Product_Name: La Sportiva - Tarantulace - 46.5 Olive/Tiger
Product.Long_Description: The TarantuLace is an unlined leather climbing shoe with asymmetric shape for advanced performance. The RN45 shoe shape is great for upper end performance without hurting your toes. The synthetic leather overlay lacing harness adds great support for entry to mid level climbers and the unlined leather is comfortable and soft. The aggressive rubber heel rand lets you stand in micro edges and the FriXion RS rubber is hard wearing yet sticky for long life. This is great shoe for gym climbers and outdoor climbers that need a one-quiver shoe that does it all.

Product.Product_Name: Salewa - Womens Rapace GTX - 6 Shaded Spruce/Sulphur Spring
Product.Long_Description: The Rapace GTX is a lightweight mountaineering boot that teams a hard-wearing nubuck and fabric upper with waterproof and breathable GORE-TEX protection.

Product.Product_Name: Asolo - Mont Blanc GV - 9.5 Black/Red
Product.Long_Description: Technical and high altitude mountaineering and extreme use in cold environments. External gaiter in stretch nylon and neoprene lining with YKK zip closure, heat-sealed seams and perimeter edge in Pu guarantees protection, support and performance. Inner boot in nylon and Cordura offers protection, support and lightness with webbing closure; Schoeller Soft Shell used in the collar and flex points improves movement and comfort. Gore-Tex Insulated Comfort Footwear lining guarantees insulation, waterproofing and breathability, while the more elastic Gore-Tex Zamba is used in the front gusset. Vibram 1229 Mulaz sole and microporous midsole for maximum lightness and thermal insulation. Adaptable for automatic crampons.
Product.Google_Categorization: Apparel & Accessories > Shoes > Outdoor Shoes > Hiking Shoes

Product.Product_Name: Scarpa - Instinct - 35.5 Black Orange
Product.Long_Description: Climbers who want one shoe for all styles of climbing will favor Scarpas performance-oriented Instinct collection. A classic shoe reinvigorated the updated Instinct lace still offers a performance fit on a curved, asymmetric last, but now with a micro suede synthetic upper and a welded overlay. Performance is enhanced with a high degree of pre-stored power in the Bi-Tension Active Rand, which pulls the sole up and back onto the forefoot giving an extremely precise, low profile fit. The award winning Instinct VS heel is now incorporated into the 2016 lace version.

Product.Product_Name: La Sportiva - Finale - 38 Aloe/Moss
Product.Long_Description: Entry-level made in Italy model ideal for both indoor and outdoor climbing. This comfortable shoe is the perfect choice for climbing long routes. Excellent price/quality ratio. The Finale model is snug fitting, comfortable and easy to put on. The heel strap tension has been minimised to enhance comfort even after several hours. The uppers are extremely breathable thanks to the central perforated panel. The boot uses a 5mm Vibram XS Edge sole for maximum durability.

Product.Product_Name: La Sportiva - Finale - 48 Aloe/Moss
Product.Long_Description: Entry-level made in Italy model ideal for both indoor and outdoor climbing. This comfortable shoe is the perfect choice for climbing long routes. Excellent price/quality ratio. The Finale model is snug fitting, comfortable and easy to put on. The heel strap tension has been minimised to enhance comfort even after several hours. The uppers are extremely breathable thanks to the central perforated panel. The boot uses a 5mm Vibram XS Edge sole for maximum durability.

Product.Product_Name: La Sportiva - Tarantula Boulder Womens - 34.5 Ice/Crystal
Product.Long_Description: Focus on more complex moves, not painful feet. The womens La Sportiva Tarantula Boulder climbing shoes increase durability, sensitivity and dynamic performance while keeping the fit comfortable.

Product.Product_Name: EVOLV - DEFY LACE M - 9.5 - Fog Gray/Banana
Product.Long_Description: The Defy Lace was designed for the climber that has comfort and all-around moderate performance in mind. The single layer leather, which features a semi perforated upper, allows the shoe to melt and mold to your foot giving that custom fit, while ensuring that the shoe does not lose structure; the perforations do not actually penetrate the upper. The 3/4 length speed lace closure will ensure that you can sinch the shoe up quickly when you need to add a little more performance and drive some extra power to your toes. The 1.2 mm full-length midsole paired with a slightly asymmetric toe profile will give you a sturdy enough platform to edge on vertical faces or provide enough confidence for your off vertical endeavors.

Product.Product_Name: Black Diamond - Method S - 8.5 Octane
Product.Long_Description: The Method S is designed for steep climbing. A soft midsole, downturned last, and rubberized toe box makes heel hooks and toe hooks feel like second nature, while the single Velcro strap provides easy transitions between burns. Molded sticky rubber soles are optimized for grip without sacrificing performance or weight. An engineered knit upper makes the Method S breathable and comfortable next to the skin.

Product.Product_Name: SCARPA - INSTINCT SR - 34 - Tonic
Product.Long_Description: The Instinct SR is designed with indoor climbing in mind. The large rubber cover above the toe area enables powerful toe-hooking. Integral heel cup for sensitive heel-hooking, slightly asymmetrical and downturned shape, with a medium angled toe box.

Product.Product_Name: EVOLV - ELEKTRA LACE W - 9.5 - Silk White/Grape
Product.Long_Description: The Elektra lace was designed for the climber that has a lower volume and narrower foot with comfort and all-around moderate performance in mind. The single layer leather, which features a semi perforated upper, allows the shoe to melt and mold to your foot giving that custom fit while ensuring that the shoe does not lose structure; the perforations do not actually penetrate the upper. The 3/4 length speed lace closure will ensure that you can sinch the shoe up quickly when you need to add a little more performance and drive some extra power to your toes. The 1.2 mm full-length midsole paired with a slightly asymmetric toe profile will give you a sturdy enough platform to edge on vertical faces or provide enough confidence for your off vertical endeavors.

Product.Product_Name: La Sportiva - Tarantula Womens - 38.5 Red Plum
Product.Long_Description: This comfortable shoe is easy to use and easy to get on and off in a flash. The unlined upper is excellent for moisture management and super comfortable on your foot all day. The shape is round and higher volume for the climber not looking to mangle their feet yet aggressive enough to perform when needed. The highly adjustable closure system adapts to multiple foot types and shapes.

Product.Product_Name: La Sportiva - G-Tech - 40 Black/Yellow
Product.Long_Description: Achieving equilibrium between technical performance and the demands for modern alpinists and mountaineers is a perpetual challenge. The state-of-the-art G-Tech orchestrates a perfect blend of ultralight construction, durable materials, superlative comfort, and elite performance for technical ice climbing and moving fast in the mountains.
Product.Google_Categorization: Apparel & Accessories > Shoes > Outdoor Shoes > Hiking Shoes

Product.Product_Name: Scarpa - Vapor - 38 Smoke/Yellow
Product.Long_Description: A precise, versatile and best-selling shoe that marries a comfortable fit with steep climbing performance, the Vapor V features fresh colors, a microfiber upper and our Bi-Tension active rand for a premium combo of durability and sensitivity.

Product.Product_Name: La Sportiva - Tarantula Boulder - 45.5 Metal/Sunset
Product.Long_Description: The best-selling Tarantula climbing shoe is reinvigorated with additional features to help beginner climbers focus on bouldering and more complex climbing movements. Additional Toe Rubber increases durability and Toe-hooking capabilities, and an updated heel helps facilitate heel hooking. User profile: For beginners looking to engage and excel quickly, this responsive and unstructured shoe now offers additional technology to help facilitate advanced movements and techniques.

Product.Product_Name: LA SPORTIVA - NEPAL CUBE GTX WOMENS - 38 - Ice
Product.Long_Description: The Nepal Cube GTX is a warm and technical mountaineering boot designed to provide a lightweight yet robust boot to tackle big peaks, mixed terrain, glacier travel and vertical ice. Offering features like the carbon tech honeycomb insole, an insulated comfort Gore-Tex membrane and a removable and adjustable tongue, the Nepal Cubes provides a secure and precise fit to optimize your objective.

Product.Product_Name: SCARPA - VAPOR WOMENS - 35 - Maldive
Product.Long_Description: Scarpas most supportive lace-up, the Vapor is a technical trad shoe that provides serious stability and plush comfort, whether youre jamming cracks or out on the face. The Vapors stiff platform features minimal stitching to increase comfort and eliminate hotspots.

Product.Product_Name: La Sportiva - Tarantula - 42.5 Black/Poppy
Product.Long_Description: The La Sportiva Tarantula climbing shoes will get you scaling projects like its namesake, without all the extra appendages. Climbers will enjoy the comfortable fit and performance of its unlined asymmetrical shape and ultra-thin synthetic fiber-laminate midsole that provide torsional support for various foot shapes. That way, indoors or outdoors, you can tackle steep routes and execute tricky moves with confidence. Easy to use and slip on or off, the Tarantulas an easy decision for beginners and seasoned climbers alike.

Product.Product_Name: La Sportiva - Katana Lace - 37.5 Yellow/Black
Product.Long_Description: Those with a sharp eye for tiny footholds can make good use of the La Sportiva Katana Lace. A rock climbing shoe that lends the ability to place toes onto small edges and hook into pockets thanks to its thin heel, downward turn, and asymmetrical shape. The mens version boasts a single, full-length outsole that allows for pushing effectively onto verticle and technical terrain. And despite the shape, they stay comfortable throughout the day. Climbers can expect all the friction and accuracy they need while twisting into thin cracks and scaling slabs while wearing the Katana.

Product.Product_Name: Evolv - Shaman Pro LV - 9 Black/Beet Red
Product.Long_Description: New to the 2023 Evolv Lab family, the Shaman Pro Low Volume introduces an entirely new way of thinking about climbing shoe design. Say goodbye to painful downsizing to optimize performance: Evolvs new Wrap technology holds the foot securely around the instep, eliminating the need to painfully pressure your toes into the front of the shoe. The Shaman Pro LV fits just like their best-selling Shaman Lace LV and Shaman Strap LV, but is a softer, more sensitive model for comp-style bouldering and lead routes. A very thin love bump midsole combined with our new Wrap technology yields a super-sensitive shoe that can smear on any angle and has enough stiffness under the toes to power off tiny chips, for a comfortable and powerful fit right out of the box.

Product.Product_Name: Evolv - Geshido Womens - M6.5/W7.5 White/Coral/Black
Product.Long_Description: Designed for the climber that needs performance to excel on all types of terrain from moderately overhanging to vertical and off-vertical faces for long periods of time. The Geshido is built with a single later vegan synthetic upper, which will, keep the shoe feeling tighter and more powerful. The Geshido has a 2-strap hook and loop closure system for easy on and off. Equipped with a 1.2 full-length plastic midsole that will ensure that you have enough power to drive through small features and provide confidence during those technical sequences. The Geshido has a thinner heel rand to yield when the route goes past vertical but is paired with a dark spine heel midsole to ensure that there is plenty of rigidity and power to the toes when needed.

Product.Long_Description: The Scarpa Vapor V is perfect for the climber needing that performance edge out of changing terrain. From slabs to steep, this climbing shoe hooks and claws down on overhanging terrain. The Vapor Vs synthetic upper holds its shape when you use it while the leatherback molds to the shape of your heel, great for all day use. The womens specific fit of the Vapor V from Scarpa has a narrower last in the heel and a lower volume in the forefoot. A great climbing shoe for any climber who has a smaller and lower volume foot but is also looking for that performance quality Scarpa brings to all their climbing shoes Not sure if these are for you? Check out How to Choose Rock Climbing Shoes to see if the Scarpa Vapor Vs have what you need from your next climbing shoe.

Product.Product_Name: Scarpa - Quantic Wmn - 36.5 Dust Grey/Black
Product.Long_Description: The new Quantic was designed for climbers who are looking for a comfortable shoe that performs across a wide spectrum of climbing disciplines. The slightly downturned shape with a medium-to-high angled toe box is paired with flexan insert plus HT-Tension to create a shoe that is extremely versatile. The Quantic combines a soft adaptable upper with a full-length outsole providing a solid platform for excellent edging ability. At home in either the gym or on rock, the Quantic is a perfect choice for climbers that demand a shoe for all modern climbing disciplines and classic multi pitch routes as well. The Womens model shares all of the features of the Mens version but with a slightly lower volume fit. The Quantic is surprisingly comfortable for a performance climbing shoe!

Product.Product_Name: Scarpa - Instinct S - 38 Black/Azure
Product.Long_Description: The Scarpa Instinct S is the performance boulder and slab slipper climbing shoe of the multitalented Instinct family. The Instinct S features a delicate layer of 3.55mm thick rubber to ensure maximum sensitivity. Combining this with the Vibram XS Grip2 compound gives the Instinct S an unbridled ability to feel the rocks surface with the foot, detect almost imperceptible holds, and grip onto them with the greatest level of confidence possible. The Instinct S thrives on sustained overhanging terrain with minimal footholds and for smearing on polished, glassy slab routes on granite. Climb better, climb instinctively. Being a slipper, the Instinct S has been designed to fit as snugly as possible to achieve a performance fit. The upper is synthetic microsuede which will break-in over time but provide the absolute minimum amount of stretch, so remember to size appropriately.

Product.Product_Name: LA SPORTIVA - ARAGON MENS - 39.5 - Clayjasminegreen
Product.Long_Description: A climbing shoe with double hook & loop closure fastening, ideal for beginners and for all climbers who need a product that is comfortable and quick to put on. Perfect for use on indoor climbing walls.

Product.Product_Name: La Sportiva - Tarantula Womens - 35 Red Plum
Product.Long_Description: This comfortable shoe is easy to use and easy to get on and off in a flash. The unlined upper is excellent for moisture management and super comfortable on your foot all day. The shape is round and higher volume for the climber not looking to mangle their feet yet aggressive enough to perform when needed. The highly adjustable closure system adapts to multiple foot types and shapes.

Product.Product_Name: La Sportiva - Tarantulace Womens - 41.5 Topaz/Red Plum
Product.Long_Description: For those in the market for a more forgiving fit, La Sportivas Tarantulace climbing shoes for women might be whats needed. Their supportive, asymmetrical shape, roomy toe box, and unlined leather upper will mitigate strain so you can climb longer in comfort. Its durable rubber heel and FriXion RS rubber are sticky and provided a powerful edging platform. Made for indoor and outdoor climbers alike, the Tarantulacell get you scaling projects with confidence after a quick pull of its lacing harness.

Product.Product_Name: TENAYA - TANTA SHOES - 13.5
Product.Long_Description: Created with Tenayas new M4 technology, the Tanta features exceptional comfort and many qualities of their highest performance climbing shoes. Neither too stiff nor too soft, slightly curved, with glove-like fit and dynamic response, the Tanta performs great in all kinds of situations. Expect the Tanta to make your climbing feel easier and more intuitive, leading your footwork to flow in a natural and precise way. The Tanta is the perfect training companion for logging vertical mileage at the climbing gym.

Product.Product_Name: La Sportiva - Tarantula - 47 Black/Poppy
Product.Long_Description: The La Sportiva Tarantula climbing shoes will get you scaling projects like its namesake, without all the extra appendages. Climbers will enjoy the comfortable fit and performance of its unlined asymmetrical shape and ultra-thin synthetic fiber-laminate midsole that provide torsional support for various foot shapes. That way, indoors or outdoors, you can tackle steep routes and execute tricky moves with confidence. Easy to use and slip on or off, the Tarantulas an easy decision for beginners and seasoned climbers alike.

Product.Product_Name: Five Ten - Niad Lace - 9 Core Black, Crew Red, Acid Mint
Product.Long_Description: Face or crack. Granite or sandstone. The adidas Five Ten NIAD Lace Climbing Shoes deliver time-tested all-around performance. Versatile Stealth C4 rubber edges, grips and smears across all surfaces, indoors and out. The form fit heel and stiff midsole provide a positive feel. A lined toe box enhances comfort.
Product.Color: Core Black, Crew Red, Acid Mint

Product.Product_Name: Evolv - Phantom LV - 7 White/Black
Product.Long_Description: The Evolv Phantom LV was designed for climbing the worlds most gymnastic problems and routes. It is for the climber who needs equal sensitivity and power from their climbing shoe. The shoe really begins to shine on steeper angles where toe and heel hooking are mandatory. The vegan synthetic upper built is on an aggressively profiled last to ensure your foot is always in a power position and that the shoe will not stretch too much over time. The Phantom LV features two midsoles that act in unison. The first midsole is a variable thickness plastic midsole. The second midsole is a rubber midsole, cut out under the big toe for increased sensitivity. The heel features Evolvs most sensitive midsole, called the Dark Spine, and helps drive power through your foot to the toe box while remaining sensitive enough to feel small features.

Product.Product_Name: La Sportiva - Tarantulace - 45 Olive/Tiger
Product.Long_Description: The TarantuLace is an unlined leather climbing shoe with asymmetric shape for advanced performance. The RN45 shoe shape is great for upper end performance without hurting your toes. The synthetic leather overlay lacing harness adds great support for entry to mid level climbers and the unlined leather is comfortable and soft. The aggressive rubber heel rand lets you stand in micro edges and the FriXion RS rubber is hard wearing yet sticky for long life. This is great shoe for gym climbers and outdoor climbers that need a one-quiver shoe that does it all.

Product.Product_Name: SCARPA - VAPOR W - 35 - Dahlia/Maldive
Product.Long_Description: Scarpas most supportive lace-up, the Vapor is a technical trad shoe that provides serious stability and plush comfort, whether youre jamming cracks or out on the face. The Vapors stiff platform features minimal stitching to increase comfort and eliminate hotspots.

Product.Product_Name: La Sportiva - Tarantula - 44.5 Black/Poppy
Product.Long_Description: The La Sportiva Tarantula climbing shoes will get you scaling projects like its namesake, without all the extra appendages. Climbers will enjoy the comfortable fit and performance of its unlined asymmetrical shape and ultra-thin synthetic fiber-laminate midsole that provide torsional support for various foot shapes. That way, indoors or outdoors, you can tackle steep routes and execute tricky moves with confidence. Easy to use and slip on or off, the Tarantulas an easy decision for beginners and seasoned climbers alike.

Product.Product_Name: SCARPA - INSTINCT SR - 35 - Tonic
Product.Long_Description: The Instinct SR is designed with indoor climbing in mind. The large rubber cover above the toe area enables powerful toe-hooking. Integral heel cup for sensitive heel-hooking, slightly asymmetrical and downturned shape, with a medium angled toe box.

Product.Product_Name: La Sportiva - Tarantula - 43.5 Black/Poppy
Product.Long_Description: The La Sportiva Tarantula climbing shoes will get you scaling projects like its namesake, without all the extra appendages. Climbers will enjoy the comfortable fit and performance of its unlined asymmetrical shape and ultra-thin synthetic fiber-laminate midsole that provide torsional support for various foot shapes. That way, indoors or outdoors, you can tackle steep routes and execute tricky moves with confidence. Easy to use and slip on or off, the Tarantulas an easy decision for beginners and seasoned climbers alike.

Product.Product_Name: LA SPORTIVA - NEPAL CUBE GTX WOMENS - 40 - Ice
Product.Long_Description: The Nepal Cube GTX is a warm and technical mountaineering boot designed to provide a lightweight yet robust boot to tackle big peaks, mixed terrain, glacier travel and vertical ice. Offering features like the carbon tech honeycomb insole, an insulated comfort Gore-Tex membrane and a removable and adjustable tongue, the Nepal Cubes provides a secure and precise fit to optimize your objective.
Product.Google_Categorization: Apparel & Accessories > Shoes > Outdoor Shoes > Hiking Shoes

Product.Product_Name: SCARPA - MONT BLANC PRO GTX WMNS - 41.5 - Green Blue
Product.Long_Description: Scarpas most versatile and durable alpine boot that combines modern features with old-school reliability, the Mont Blanc Pro GTX features a super-tough leather upper with an integrated cuff gaiter that protects and performs over snow, ice, and mixed alpine terrain.
Product.Google_Categorization: Apparel & Accessories > Shoes > Outdoor Shoes > Hiking Shoes

Product.Product_Name: Scarpa - Vapor - 41.5 Dust Gray/Aqua
Product.Long_Description: A precise, versatile and best-selling shoe that marries a comfortable fit with steep climbing performance, the Vapor Womens features fresh colors, a microfiber upper and our Bi-Tension active rand for a premium combo of durability and sensitivity. The Vapor Womens features a modified fit to better suit lower volume feet and also utilizes softer and sticker XS Grip 2 rubber.

Product.Product_Name: Scarpa - Instinct VS - 34.5 Black/Orange
Product.Long_Description: Built for experts who demand technical exactitude, the Instinct VS combines sensitivity and power to create a versatile tool for bouldering or hard sport routes. Powerful Bi-tension randing with all Microsuede construction allows the shoe to dynamically adjust to different kinds foot flexion with no residual stretch. This means top performance for bouldering with longevity, all with surprising comfort. The Instinct VSs strong, slipper like top offers enhanced control, power and fit thanks to a single, floating hook-and-loop powerstrap over a slipper-like elastic band. The two-part sole allows the front and back of the foot to work independently for dynamic maneuverability.

Product.Product_Name: La Sportiva - Tarantula Womens - 40.5 Red Plum
Product.Long_Description: This comfortable shoe is easy to use and easy to get on and off in a flash. The unlined upper is excellent for moisture management and super comfortable on your foot all day. The shape is round and higher volume for the climber not looking to mangle their feet yet aggressive enough to perform when needed. The highly adjustable closure system adapts to multiple foot types and shapes.

Product.Product_Name: LA SPORTIVA - ARAGON MENS - 39 - Clayjasminegreen
Product.Long_Description: A climbing shoe with double hook & loop closure fastening, ideal for beginners and for all climbers who need a product that is comfortable and quick to put on. Perfect for use on indoor climbing walls.

Product.Product_Name: La Sportiva - Tarantula Boulder - 41 Metal/Sunset
Product.Long_Description: The best-selling Tarantula climbing shoe is reinvigorated with additional features to help beginner climbers focus on bouldering and more complex climbing movements. Additional Toe Rubber increases durability and Toe-hooking capabilities, and an updated heel helps facilitate heel hooking. User profile: For beginners looking to engage and excel quickly, this responsive and unstructured shoe now offers additional technology to help facilitate advanced movements and techniques.

Product.Product_Name: SCARPA - ORIGIN W - 42 - Maldive/Black
Product.Long_Description: The starting point in your climbing career is of fundamental importance. It gives rise to the genetic building blocks that shape your climbing life. The Origin offers a lush leather upper, giving a feeling of padded luxury that is rarely found in a shoe aimed at encouraging people to start climbing. The flat profile and relatively relaxed randing ease the climbers feet into a cocoon of comfort. The hook-and-loop closure keeps the foot snug and well positioned during use. The Origin introduces SCARPAs Vision rubber, a proprietary compound that is both sticky and resilient to all the conditions that new climbers feet will experience.

Product.Product_Name: LA SPORTIVA - NEPAL CUBE GTX MENS - 45 - Yellow
Product.Long_Description: The Nepal Cube GTX is a warm and technical mountaineering boot designed to provide a lightweight yet robust boot to tackle big peaks, mixed terrain, glacier travel and vertical ice. Offering features like the carbon tech honeycomb insole, an insulated comfort Gore-Tex membrane and a removable and adjustable tongue, the Nepal Cubes provides a secure and precise fit to optimize your objective.

Product.Product_Name: La Sportiva - Tarantula Womens - 37.5 Red Plum
Product.Long_Description: This comfortable shoe is easy to use and easy to get on and off in a flash. Product.Product_Name: SCARPA - VAPOR V WOMENS - 36.5 - Dahlia/Aqua
Product.Long_Description: The Scarpa Vapor V is perfect for the climber needing that performance edge out of changing terrain. From slabs to steep, this climbing shoe hooks and claws down on overhanging terrain. The Vapor Vs synthetic upper holds its shape when you use it while the leatherback molds to the shape of your heel, great for all day use. The womens specific fit of the Vapor V from Scarpa has a narrower last in the heel and a lower volume in the forefoot. A great climbing shoe for any climber who has a smaller and lower volume foot but is also looking for that performance quality Scarpa brings to all their climbing shoes Not sure if these are for you? Check out How to Choose Rock Climbing Shoes to see if the Scarpa Vapor Vs have what you need from your next climbing shoe.

Product.Product_Name: SCARPA - ORIGIN W - 35 - Maldive/Black
Product.Long_Description: The starting point in your climbing career is of fundamental importance. It gives rise to the genetic building blocks that shape your climbing life. The Origin offers a lush leather upper, giving a feeling of padded luxury that is rarely found in a shoe aimed at encouraging people to start climbing. The flat profile and relatively relaxed randing ease the climbers feet into a cocoon of comfort. The hook-and-loop closure keeps the foot snug and well positioned during use. The Origin introduces SCARPAs Vision rubber, a proprietary compound that is both sticky and resilient to all the conditions that new climbers feet will experience.

Product.Product_Name: Scarpa - Instinct - 44 - Black Orange
Product.Long_Description: Climbers who want one shoe for all styles of climbing will favor Scarpas performance-oriented Instinct collection. A classic shoe reinvigorated the updated Instinct lace still offers a performance fit on a curved, asymmetric last, but now with a micro suede synthetic upper and a welded overlay. Performance is enhanced with a high degree of pre-stored power in the Bi-Tension Active Rand, which pulls the sole up and back onto the forefoot giving an extremely precise, low profile fit. The award winning Instinct VS heel is now incorporated into the 2016 lace version.

Product.Product_Name: Tenaya - Indalo - 3
Product.Long_Description: The Tenaya Indalo climbing shoe is a shoe that appeals to boulderers and sport climbers alike. Although the developers focused on a high level of comfort, the Indalo also brings power, precision and balance to the foot. Dynamic response is the magic word here. The last is strongly asymmetrical with high pre-tension and an aggressive descent, so it withstands many imaginable situations and movements when climbing. The Indalo offers maximum control on the smallest steps and ledges and doesnt forget about friction climbing. The large toe patch is made of a special, extremely grippy rubber compound, which also extends along the inside edge to the sole to give you optimal support when hooking and make this area more durable.

Product.Product_Name: Five Ten - Kirigami - 5.5 Dove Grey, Core Black, Solar Red
Product.Long_Description: When long-wearing comfort outweighs the need for a technical, aggressive feel, the Five Ten Womens Kirigami Climbing Shoes set a versatile standard. The neutral fit and rounded toe box work with the medium flex to support all-purpose climbing, providing comfort for beginners and more advanced climbers alike.
Product.Color: Dove Grey, Core Black, Solar Red

Product.Product_Name: EVOLV - ELEKTRA - 6 - Merlot/Gray
Product.Long_Description: The Elektra is one of the best selling low-volume climbing shoes in the world. Anatomical fit that is great for beginners and advanced climbers coupled with great looks make it a no-brainer for a first time or repeat buyer. The Synthratek VX upper and Agion Antimicrobial liner ensure lasting comfort and odor protection. The Split tongue and dual hook and loop closure system provide easy accessibility and a secure fit.

Product.Product_Name: La Sportiva - Kubo Womens - 33.5 Regular Royal/Love Potion
Product.Long_Description: La Sportivas Womens Kubo is a versatile climbing shoe dedicated to indoor climbing both boulder and lead, ideal for those looking for comfort and versatility. Innovation is represented by the newly constructed heel which is integrated into the sole for better grip and greater protection as well as for an accentuated elasticity and overall sensitivity. Kubo provides excellent comfort thanks to the unlined uppers in microfiber and suede. It also facilitates the customization of volumes quickly and precisely thanks to the double opposing strap closure. The toe cap is integrated into the toe edge to protect against abrasions and the construction of the sole is designed to allow resoling.

Product.Product_Name: La Sportiva - Tarantula Boulder Womens - 34 Ice/Crystal
Product.Long_Description: Focus on more complex moves, not painful feet. The womens La Sportiva Tarantula Boulder climbing shoes increase durability, sensitivity and dynamic performance while keeping the fit comfortable.

Product.Long_Description: Engineered to provide laser precision on routes and boulder problems that require absolute focus, this Velcro, high-performance shoe has a slightly downturned, womens specific last for edging prowess on steeper terrain. With the highest grade European leather upper and BDs Engineered Knit Technology tongue, the Focus provides breathability and durability. They also printed high friction rubber on the vamp area of the shoethis innovative process minimizes bulk while maximizing

Product.Product_Name: SCARPA - INSTINCT SR - 36.5 - Tonic
Product.Long_Description: The Instinct SR is designed with indoor climbing in mind. The large rubber cover above the toe area enables powerful toe-hooking. Integral heel cup for sensitive heel-hooking, slightly asymmetrical and downturned shape, with a medium angled toe box.

Product.Product_Name: Evolv - Shaman Pro LV - 8 Black/Beet Red
Product.Long_Description: New to the 2023 Evolv Lab family, the Shaman Pro Low Volume introduces an entirely new way of thinking about climbing shoe design. Say goodbye to painful downsizing to optimize performance: Evolvs new Wrap technology holds the foot securely around the instep, eliminating the need to painfully pressure your toes into the front of the shoe. The Shaman Pro LV fits just like their best-selling Shaman Lace LV and Shaman Strap LV, but is a softer, more sensitive model for comp-style bouldering and lead routes. A very thin love bump midsole combined with our new Wrap technology yields a super-sensitive shoe that can smear on any angle and has enough stiffness under the toes to power off tiny chips, for a comfortable and powerful fit right out of the box.

Product.Product_Name: LA SPORTIVA - ARAGON MENS - 38.5 - Clayjasminegreen
Product.Long_Description: A climbing shoe with double hook & loop closure fastening, ideal for beginners and for all climbers who need a product that is comfortable and quick to put on. Perfect for use on indoor climbing walls.

Product.Product_Name: SCARPA - INSTINCT VS W - 36.5 - Black/Aqua
Product.Long_Description: Combining a curved, asymmetrical last with a slightly softer construction and thinner sole for enhanced flexibility and sensitivity, the Instinct VS is the cornerstone of Scarpas Performance linean all-around shoe that handles a variety of styles at the highest level.

Product.Product_Name: EVOLV - DEFY LACE M - 11 - Fog Gray/Banana
Product.Long_Description: The Defy Lace was designed for the climber that has comfort and all-around moderate performance in mind. The single layer leather, which features a semi perforated upper, allows the shoe to melt and mold to your foot giving that custom fit, while ensuring that the shoe does not lose structure; the perforations do not actually penetrate the upper. The 3/4 length speed lace closure will ensure that you can sinch the shoe up quickly when you need to add a little more performance and drive some extra power to your toes. The 1.2 mm full-length midsole paired with a slightly asymmetric toe profile will give you a sturdy enough platform to edge on vertical faces or provide enough confidence for your off vertical endeavors.

The supportive IPC-Tension active rand, innovative Eco leather patterning, and protection where you need it, combine to offer versatility across a wide range of classic climbs. Contact our OGExperts at (888) 547-4327 with any sizing questions.

Product.Product_Name: Scarpa - Reflex V Women - 36.5 Black/Ceramic
Product.Long_Description: Featuring a highly breathable, stretch-knit upper combined with a microfiber footbed wrapping the big toe, the Reflex V has been designed with comfort, performance, and affordability in mind. With a flat and neutral shape, the Reflex V has been constructed to meet the needs of modern indoor climbers.

Product.Product_Name: Scarpa - Quantic Wmn - 35.5 Dust Grey/Black
Product.Long_Description: The new Quantic was designed for climbers who are looking for a comfortable shoe that performs across a wide spectrum of climbing disciplines. The slightly downturned shape with a medium-to-high angled toe box is paired with flexan insert plus HT-Tension to create a shoe that is extremely versatile. The Quantic combines a soft adaptable upper with a full-length outsole providing a solid platform for excellent edging ability. At home in either the gym or on rock, the Quantic is a perfect choice for climbers that demand a shoe for all modern climbing disciplines and classic multi pitch routes as well. The Womens model shares all of the features of the Mens version but with a slightly lower volume fit. The Quantic is surprisingly comfortable for a performance climbing shoe!
