Product.Product_Name: Tenaya - Iati - 2
Product.Long_Description: The Iati takes Tenayas unrivaled ability to create comfortable high performance shoes to the next level. The last features a down-camber in the mid-foot and an aggressive down-turn in the toebox. A combination of natural and synthetic leather, coupled with a cotton liner, make the Iati a breathable shoe that maintains a consistent fit. Features like the Draxtor lacing system and RB RangeX technology create the responsiveness and versatility for which Tenaya is known. Handcrafted quality and a 3.5mm Vibram XS Grip outsole complete this remarkable shoe.

Product.Product_Name: La Sportiva - Tarantulace Womens - 39.5 Topaz/Red Plum
Product.Long_Description: For those in the market for a more forgiving fit, La Sportivas Tarantulace climbing shoes for women might be whats needed. Their supportive, asymmetrical shape, roomy toe box, and unlined leather upper will mitigate strain so you can climb longer in comfort. Its durable rubber heel and FriXion RS rubber are sticky and provided a powerful edging platform. Made for indoor and outdoor climbers alike, the Tarantulacell get you scaling projects with confidence after a quick pull of its lacing harness.

Product.Product_Name: Scarpa - Quantic - 40 Dust Grey/Mango
Product.Long_Description: The new Quantic was designed for climbers who are looking for a comfortable shoe that performs across a wide spectrum of climbing disciplines. The slightly downturned shape with a medium-to-high angled toe box is paired with flexan insert plus HT-Tension to create a shoe that is extremely versatile. The Quantic combines a soft adaptable upper with a full-length outsole providing a solid platform for excellent edging ability. At home in either the gym or on rock, the Quantic is a perfect choice for climbers that demand a shoe for all modern climbing disciplines and classic multi pitch routes as well. The Mens model shares all of the features of the Womens version but with a slightly more generous fit. The Quantic is surprisingly comfortable for a performance climbing shoe!

Product.Product_Name: Scarpa - Vapor - 36.5 Dust Gray/Aqua
Product.Long_Description: A precise, versatile and best-selling shoe that marries a comfortable fit with steep climbing performance, the Vapor Womens features fresh colors, a microfiber upper and our Bi-Tension active rand for a premium combo of durability and sensitivity. The Vapor Womens features a modified fit to better suit lower volume feet and also utilizes softer and sticker XS Grip 2 rubber.

Product.Product_Name: Evolv - Shaman Pro LV - 10 Black/Beet Red
Product.Long_Description: New to the 2023 Evolv Lab family, the Shaman Pro Low Volume introduces an entirely new way of thinking about climbing shoe design. Say goodbye to painful downsizing to optimize performance: Evolvs new Wrap technology holds the foot securely around the instep, eliminating the need to painfully pressure your toes into the front of the shoe. The Shaman Pro LV fits just like their best-selling Shaman Lace LV and Shaman Strap LV, but is a softer, more sensitive model for comp-style bouldering and lead routes. A very thin love bump midsole combined with our new Wrap technology yields a super-sensitive shoe that can smear on any angle and has enough stiffness under the toes to power off tiny chips, for a comfortable and powerful fit right out of the box.

Product.Product_Name: La Sportiva - Finale - 41.5 Aloe/Moss
Product.Long_Description: Entry-level made in Italy model ideal for both indoor and outdoor climbing. This comfortable shoe is the perfect choice for climbing long routes. Excellent price/quality ratio. The Finale model is snug fitting, comfortable and easy to put on. The heel strap tension has been minimised to enhance comfort even after several hours. The uppers are extremely breathable thanks to the central perforated panel. The boot uses a 5mm Vibram XS Edge sole for maximum durability.

Product.Product_Name: Scarpa - Vapor - 36 Dust Gray/Aqua
Product.Long_Description: A precise, versatile and best-selling shoe that marries a comfortable fit with steep climbing performance, the Vapor Womens features fresh colors, a microfiber upper and our Bi-Tension active rand for a premium combo of durability and sensitivity. The Vapor Womens features a modified fit to better suit lower volume feet and also utilizes softer and sticker XS Grip 2 rubber.

Product.Product_Name: SCARPA - VELOCE M - 45.5 - Black/Yellow
Product.Long_Description: The category defining Veloce represents a totally new concept in the Scarpa climbing collection. This indoor-specific shoe features a roomier toe box which provides beginner to intermediate climbers more comfort when wearing their shoes for extended periods of time, especially during bouldering sessions. The Veloce features their brand-new S-72 rubber which provides adhesion to even the smallest of footholds while remaining ultra-durable.

Product.Product_Name: BLACK DIAMOND - ZONE LV CLIMBING SHOES - 6 - Octane
Product.Long_Description: The Zone LV is a two-strap Velcro shoe that combines the award-winning comfort and breathability of Black Diamonds Momentum climbing shoes, with the high-performance last of their Shadows to create a shoe built for sending at the gym or the crag. The Zones upper consist of their Engineered Knit Technology, which provides stretch where you need it, support where it matters and all around exceptional breathability-meaning you can go hard at the gym without worrying about your feet overheating. The shoes last is downturned and based on BDs aggressive shape, making the Zone adept at pulling hard on steep rock or plastic. The Zones sticky Fuze rubber is molded inspired by the way they forge their carabiners and not cut from one sheet of rubber. This is their engineered solution to optimize their shoes rubber and rands for consistency and comfort. The shoes vamp area also has printed rubber for extra friction while toe-hooking, and the medium-flex midsole adds a balance of sensitivity and power. For hard training sessions, this is the Zone you want to be in.

Product.Product_Name: Scarpa - Instinct VSR - 39.5 - Black Azure
Product.Long_Description: Those looking for a mens performance rock climbing shoe that really sings while bouldering and sport climbing ought to take a close look at the Scarpa Instinct VSR. When slipping into the VSRs youll notice a supple fit and sensitive feel, the likes of which grips nuanced terrain thanks to Vibram XS Grip2 rubber soles. Part of this feel also comes courtesy of the Bi-Tension system: tensioned rubber running underfoot from toe tips to alongside your feet on both sides of the shoe. And the rubber toe patch comes in clutch for toe hooks. The VSRs are perfectly suited to lighter climbers and will excel across a spectrum of hard climbing.

Product.Product_Name: EVOLV - ELEKTRA - 10.5 - Merlot/Gray
Product.Long_Description: The Elektra is one of the best selling low-volume climbing shoes in the world. Anatomical fit that is great for beginners and advanced climbers coupled with great looks make it a no-brainer for a first time or repeat buyer. The Synthratek VX upper and Agion Antimicrobial liner ensure lasting comfort and odor protection. The Split tongue and dual hook and loop closure system provide easy accessibility and a secure fit.

Product.Product_Name: La Sportiva - Tarantula - 46 Black/Poppy
Product.Long_Description: The La Sportiva Tarantula climbing shoes will get you scaling projects like its namesake, without all the extra appendages. Climbers will enjoy the comfortable fit and performance of its unlined asymmetrical shape and ultra-thin synthetic fiber-laminate midsole that provide torsional support for various foot shapes. That way, indoors or outdoors, you can tackle steep routes and execute tricky moves with confidence. Easy to use and slip on or off, the Tarantulas an easy decision for beginners and seasoned climbers alike.

Product.Product_Name: La Sportiva - Tarantulace - 38 Olive/Tiger
Product.Long_Description: The TarantuLace is an unlined leather climbing shoe with asymmetric shape for advanced performance. The RN45 shoe shape is great for upper end performance without hurting your toes. The synthetic leather overlay lacing harness adds great support for entry to mid level climbers and the unlined leather is comfortable and soft. The aggressive rubber heel rand lets you stand in micro edges and the FriXion RS rubber is hard wearing yet sticky for long life. This is great shoe for gym climbers and outdoor climbers that need a one-quiver shoe that does it all.

Product.Product_Name: La Sportiva - Finale Womens - 41.5 Clay/Topaz
Product.Long_Description: Excellent for all-day comfort and reliable performance, the Finale is a lace-up rock shoe that is equally capable in the gym or the crag.

Product.Product_Name: Scarpa - Helix Womens - 37.5 Mandarin Red
Product.Long_Description: Comfortable, durable and undeniably classic, the flat-lasted Helix combines elemental yet refined features to yield one of Scarpas most popular shoes. With a highly adjustable lace-up construction, padded tongue and relatively symmetrical profile, the Helix is perfect for guides, advancing climbers and anyone prioritizing all-day comfort.

Product.Product_Name: Evolv - Geshido - M7/W8 Black/Teal/White
Product.Long_Description: Designed for the climber that needs performance to excel on all types of terrain from moderately overhanging to vertical and off-vertical faces for long periods of time. The Geshido is built with a single layer vegan synthetic upper, which will keep the shoe feeling tighter and more powerful. The Geshido has a 2-strap hook and loop closure system for easy on and off. Equipped with a 1.2 full-length plastic midsole that will ensure that you have enough power to drive through small features and provide confidence during those technical sequences. The Geshido has a thinner heel rand to yield when the route goes past vertical but is paired with a dark spine heel midsole to ensure that there is plenty of rigidity and power to the toes when needed.

Product.Product_Name: La Sportiva - Finale - 44 Aloe/Moss
Product.Long_Description: Entry-level made in Italy model ideal for both indoor and outdoor climbing. This comfortable shoe is the perfect choice for climbing long routes. Excellent price/quality ratio. The Finale model is snug fitting, comfortable and easy to put on. The heel strap tension has been minimised to enhance comfort even after several hours. The uppers are extremely breathable thanks to the central perforated panel. The boot uses a 5mm Vibram XS Edge sole for maximum durability.

Product.Product_Name: SCARPA - VAPOR V MENS - 40 - Ocean/Yellow
Product.Long_Description: The Scarpa Vapor V is perfect for the climber needing that performance edge out of changing terrain. From slabs to steep, this climbing shoe hooks and claws down on overhanging terrain. The Vapor Vs synthetic upper holds its shape when you use it while the leatherback molds to the shape of your heel, great for all day use. The womens specific fit of the Vapor V from Scarpa has a narrower last in the heel and a lower volume in the forefoot. A great climbing shoe for any climber who has a smaller and lower volume foot but is also looking for that performance quality Scarpa brings to all their climbing shoes Not sure if these are for you? Check out How to Choose Rock Climbing Shoes to see if the Scarpa Vapor Vs have what you need from your next climbing shoe.

Product.Product_Name: LA SPORTIVA - NEPAL CUBE GTX MENS - 45.5 - Yellow
Product.Long_Description: The Nepal Cube GTX is a warm and technical mountaineering boot designed to provide a lightweight yet robust boot to tackle big peaks, mixed terrain, glacier travel and vertical ice. Offering features like the carbon tech honeycomb insole, an insulated comfort Gore-Tex membrane and a removable and adjustable tongue, the Nepal Cubes provides a secure and precise fit to optimize your objective.

Product.Product_Name: Scarpa - Instinct - 34 Black Orange
Product.Long_Description: Climbers who want one shoe for all styles of climbing will favor Scarpas performance-oriented Instinct collection. A classic shoe reinvigorated the updated Instinct lace still offers a performance fit on a curved, asymmetric last, but now with a micro suede synthetic upper and a welded overlay. Performance is enhanced with a high degree of pre-stored power in the Bi-Tension Active Rand, which pulls the sole up and back onto the forefoot giving an extremely precise, low profile fit. The award winning Instinct VS heel is now incorporated into the 2016 lace version.

Product.Product_Name: La Sportiva - Finale Womens - 37 Clay/Topaz
Product.Long_Description: Excellent for all-day comfort and reliable performance, the Finale is a lace-up rock shoe that is equally capable in the gym or the crag.

Product.Product_Name: La Sportiva - G-Tech - 40.5 Black/Yellow
Product.Long_Description: Achieving equilibrium between technical performance and the demands for modern alpinists and mountaineers is a perpetual challenge. The state-of-the-art G-Tech orchestrates a perfect blend of ultralight construction, durable materials, superlative comfort, and elite performance for technical ice climbing and moving fast in the mountains.
Product.Google_Categorization: Apparel & Accessories > Shoes > Outdoor Shoes > Hiking Shoes

Product.Product_Name: Evolv - Shaman Pro LV - 12.5 Black/Beet Red
Product.Long_Description: New to the 2023 Evolv Lab family, the Shaman Pro Low Volume introduces an entirely new way of thinking about climbing shoe design. Say goodbye to painful downsizing to optimize performance: Evolvs new Wrap technology holds the foot securely around the instep, eliminating the need to painfully pressure your toes into the front of the shoe. The Shaman Pro LV fits just like their best-selling Shaman Lace LV and Shaman Strap LV, but is a softer, more sensitive model for comp-style bouldering and lead routes. Product.Product_Name: La Sportiva - G2 Sm Liner - 44.5 Black/Yellow
Product.Long_Description: A replacement liner for the G2 SM mountaineering boot. This liner provides insulation and warmth and has a heat-moldable upper.
Product.Google_Categorization: Apparel & Accessories > Shoes > Outdoor Shoes > Hiking Shoes

Product.Product_Name: SCARPA - ORIGIN - 35 - Iron Gray
Product.Long_Description: The starting point in our climbing career is of fundamental importance. It gives rise to the genetic building blocks that shape our climbing lives. Scarpas Origin offers a lush leather upper, giving a feeling of padded luxury that is rarely found in a shoe aimed at encouraging people to start climbing. The flat profile and relatively relaxed randing ease the climbers feet into a cocoon of comfort. The hook-and-loop closure keeps the foot snug and well positioned during use. The Origin introduces SCARPAs Vision rubber, a proprietary compound that is both sticky and resilient to all the conditions that new climbers feet will experience.

Product.Product_Name: EVOLV - ELEKTRA - 7 - Merlot/Gray
Product.Long_Description: The Elektra is one of the best selling low-volume climbing shoes in the world. Anatomical fit that is great for beginners and advanced climbers coupled with great looks make it a no-brainer for a first time or repeat buyer. The Synthratek VX upper and Agion Antimicrobial liner ensure lasting comfort and odor protection. The Split tongue and dual hook and loop closure system provide easy accessibility and a secure fit.

Product.Product_Name: SCARPA - VAPOR WOMENS - 34.5 - Maldive
Product.Long_Description: Scarpas most supportive lace-up, the Vapor is a technical trad shoe that provides serious stability and plush comfort, whether youre jamming cracks or out on the face. The Vapors stiff platform features minimal stitching to increase comfort and eliminate hotspots.

Product.Product_Name: Five Ten - Kirigami - 5 Dove Grey, Core Black, Solar Red
Product.Long_Description: When long-wearing comfort outweighs the need for a technical, aggressive feel, the Five Ten Womens Kirigami Climbing Shoes set a versatile standard. The neutral fit and rounded toe box work with the medium flex to support all-purpose climbing, providing comfort for beginners and more advanced climbers alike.

Product.Product_Name: Scarpa - Vapor Lace - 36 Yellow
Product.Long_Description: Critically acclaimed and award winning, Scarpas Vapor family is a perfect way to breathe new life into your climbing day. Quite often, improving climbers dont want to stray too far from tried and tested shoes, but increasingly they want to experiment on different types of terrain. SCARPA appreciates the opportunities that alternative versions of shoes with similar basic designs can unlock. The single piece synthetic upper promotes a new concept in comfort, and minimal stitching eliminates hot spots. The full length outsole and increased stiffness are matched with Vibram XS Edge rubber to offer the most supportive lace up in the entire climbing collection. The Vapor lace is built on the same last and utilizes the same Active Rand as the Vapor V, complimenting its softer relative extremely well

Product.Product_Name: BLACK DIAMOND - FOCUS WOMENS - 5.5 - Caspian
Product.Long_Description: Engineered to provide laser precision on routes and boulder problems that require absolute focus, this Velcro, high-performance shoe has a slightly downturned, womens specific last for edging prowess on steeper terrain. Product.Product_Name: La Sportiva - Tarantula Boulder Womens - 36 Ice/Crystal
Product.Long_Description: Focus on more complex moves, not painful feet. The womens La Sportiva Tarantula Boulder climbing shoes increase durability, sensitivity and dynamic performance while keeping the fit comfortable.

Product.Product_Name: La Sportiva - Tarantulace Womens - 36 Topaz/Red Plum
Product.Long_Description: For those in the market for a more forgiving fit, La Sportivas Tarantulace climbing shoes for women might be whats needed. Product.Product_Name: La Sportiva - Tarantula Boulder - 46 Metal/Sunset
Product.Long_Description: The best-selling Tarantula climbing shoe is reinvigorated with additional features to help beginner climbers focus on bouldering and more complex climbing movements. Additional Toe Rubber increases durability and Toe-hooking capabilities, and an updated heel helps facilitate heel hooking. User profile: For beginners looking to engage and excel quickly, this responsive and unstructured shoe now offers additional technology to help facilitate advanced movements and techniques.

Product.Product_Name: La Sportiva - Finale Womens - 36 Clay/Topaz
Product.Long_Description: Excellent for all-day comfort and reliable performance, the Finale is a lace-up rock shoe that is equally capable in the gym or the crag.

Product.Product_Name: LA SPORTIVA - MIURA - 44 - Lime
Product.Long_Description: In the line for over 10 years, the Miura is the perfect tool for performance footwork whether it be on slabs, vertical or overhanging steep rock. The high tensioned Slingshot Rand is tied into the Powerhinge on the sole so that when small edges are weighted the shoe stretches in the back half of the shoe and not in the front. This allows you to stick on the smallest edges you can find or imagine! The multi-paneled lining gives you the perfect fit and the speed lacing system laces up in a cinch.

Product.Product_Name: LA SPORTIVA - NEPAL CUBE GTX WOMENS - 42 - Ice
Product.Long_Description: The Nepal Cube GTX is a warm and technical mountaineering boot designed to provide a lightweight yet robust boot to tackle big peaks, mixed terrain, glacier travel and vertical ice. Offering features like the carbon tech honeycomb insole, an insulated comfort Gore-Tex membrane and a removable and adjustable tongue, the Nepal Cubes provides a secure and precise fit to optimize your objective.

Product.Product_Name: Asolo - Alta Via GV - 7 Black/Green
Product.Long_Description: Technical use on high altitude terrain and ice. One piece water-resistance Perwanger leather offers protection and comfort, while the Gore-Tex Insulated Comfort Footwear lining guarantees insulation, waterproofness and breathability. The outsole package consists of a Pu frame that guarantees stability, rigidity and cushioning, while the Asolo/Vibram Vertical sole has a self-cleaning design and offers maximum support, grip and torsional stability adaptable for the automatic crampons. To complete the model a rubber rand all around and a hardware directional lacing system for fast and precise lace up.

Product.Product_Name: Scarpa - Instinct VSR - 36 - Black Azure
Product.Long_Description: Those looking for a mens performance rock climbing shoe that really sings while bouldering and sport climbing ought to take a close look at the Scarpa Instinct VSR. When slipping into the VSRs youll notice a supple fit and sensitive feel, the likes of which grips nuanced terrain thanks to Vibram XS Grip2 rubber soles. Part of this feel also comes courtesy of the Bi-Tension system: tensioned rubber running underfoot from toe tips to alongside your feet on both sides of the shoe. And the rubber toe patch comes in clutch for toe hooks. The VSRs are perfectly suited to lighter climbers and will excel across a spectrum of hard climbing.

Product.Product_Name: LA SPORTIVA - NEPAL CUBE GTX MENS - 46 - Yellow

Offering features like the carbon tech honeycomb insole, an insulated comfort Gore-Tex membrane and a removable and adjustable tongue, the Nepal Cubes provides a secure and precise fit to optimize your objective.

Product.Product_Name: La Sportiva - Finale - 37 Aloe/Moss
Product.Long_Description: Entry-level made in Italy model ideal for both indoor and outdoor climbing. This comfortable shoe is the perfect choice for climbing long routes. Excellent price/quality ratio. The Finale model is snug fitting, comfortable and easy to put on. The heel strap tension has been minimised to enhance comfort even after several hours. The uppers are extremely breathable thanks to the central perforated panel. The boot uses a 5mm Vibram XS Edge sole for maximum durability.

Product.Product_Name: La Sportiva - Tarantula Womens - 36.5 Red Plum
Product.Long_Description: This comfortable shoe is easy to use and easy to get on and off in a flash. The highly adjustable closure system adapts to multiple foot types and shapes.

Product.Product_Name: Scarpa - Instinct VSR - 36.5 - Black Azure
Product.Long_Description: Those looking for a mens performance rock climbing shoe that really sings while bouldering and sport climbing ought to take a close look at the Scarpa Instinct VSR. Product.Product_Name: EVOLV - DEFY LACE M - 10 - Fog Gray/Banana
Product.Long_Description: The Defy Lace was designed for the climber that has comfort and all-around moderate performance in mind. The single layer leather, which features a semi perforated upper, allows the shoe to melt and mold to your foot giving that custom fit, while ensuring that the shoe does not lose structure; the perforations do not actually penetrate the upper. The 3/4 length speed lace closure will ensure that you can sinch the shoe up quickly when you need to add a little more performance and drive some extra power to your toes. The 1.2 mm full-length midsole paired with a slightly asymmetric toe profile will give you a sturdy enough platform to edge on vertical faces or provide enough confidence for your off vertical endeavors.

Product.Product_Name: EVOLV - ZENIST W - 6 - White/Teal/Black
Product.Long_Description: The Zenist was designed for the competition climber that has a lower volume and narrower foot and who needs the most feedback from their shoes during precise foot placements and delicate heel & toe hooks. The vegan synthetic upper built on an aggressively profiled last will ensure your foot is always in a power position and that the shoe will not stretch too much over time. The midsole featured in the Zenist is a rubber midsole that provides just the right amount of rigidity without sacrificing the sensitivity. When winning the competition is on the line feedback from your shoes can mean the difference between winning and competing.

Product.Product_Name: La Sportiva - Tarantula - 40 Black/Poppy
Product.Long_Description: The La Sportiva Tarantula climbing shoes will get you scaling projects like its namesake, without all the extra appendages. Climbers will enjoy the comfortable fit and performance of its unlined asymmetrical shape and ultra-thin synthetic fiber-laminate midsole that provide torsional support for various foot shapes. That way, indoors or outdoors, you can tackle steep routes and execute tricky moves with confidence. Easy to use and slip on or off, the Tarantulas an easy decision for beginners and seasoned climbers alike.

Product.Product_Name: Asolo - Mont Blanc GV - 12 Black/Red
Product.Long_Description: Technical and high altitude mountaineering and extreme use in cold environments. External gaiter in stretch nylon and neoprene lining with YKK zip closure, heat-sealed seams and perimeter edge in Pu guarantees protection, support and performance. Inner boot in nylon and Cordura offers protection, support and lightness with webbing closure; Schoeller Soft Shell used in the collar and flex points improves movement and comfort. Gore-Tex Insulated Comfort Footwear lining guarantees insulation, waterproofing and breathability, while the more elastic Gore-Tex Zamba is used in the front gusset. Vibram 1229 Mulaz sole and microporous midsole for maximum lightness and thermal insulation. Adaptable for automatic crampons.

The Phantom LV features two midsoles that act in unison. The first midsole is a variable thickness plastic midsole. The second midsole is a rubber midsole, cut out under the big toe for increased sensitivity. Product.Product_Name: La Sportiva - Spantik Double Boot - 41.5 - Yellow
Product.Long_Description: The cutting edge of mountain-boot technology, the Spantik (hint: its a peak in the Karakoram Himal whose Golden Pillar is synonymous with extreme alpinism) combines all the latest, lightest materials to shave a full pound compared to the all-leather La Sportiva Nuptse double boot while still offering unimpeachable climbing performance. The Spantik is at home at altitudes up to 8000 meters, and could be used under even higher and colder conditions with the addition of an insulated overboot. Customers who buy the Spantik in our shop are often headed to Denali, Aconcagua, and similar peaks. The Spantiks Fast Lacing System is particularly cool, because the last thing you want to do when your brain is deprived of oxygen is try to lace your boots with cold fingers. The Spantik system therefore allows you to set the desired tightness of your boots in the comfort of your living room, so that you can tighten them with one hand at altitude, even while wearing gloves.

Product.Product_Name: La Sportiva - Katana Lace Womens - 34.5 White/Black
Product.Long_Description: Those with a sharp eye for tiny footholds can make good use of the La Sportiva Katana Lace. A rock climbing shoe thatll help you place toes onto small edges and hook into pockets. This comes courtesy of its thin heel, downward turn, and asymmetrical shape. The womens version is softer and boasts a half-length outsole for easy flex. That way you can maximize friction and lend greater freedom of movement to the foot. And despite the shape, they stay comfortable throughout the day. Climbers can expect all the friction and accuracy they need while twisting into thin cracks and scaling slabs while wearing the Katana Lace.

Product.Product_Name: La Sportiva - Tarantula - 37 Black/Poppy
Product.Long_Description: The La Sportiva Tarantula climbing shoes will get you scaling projects like its namesake, without all the extra appendages. Climbers will enjoy the comfortable fit and performance of its unlined asymmetrical shape and ultra-thin synthetic fiber-laminate midsole that provide torsional support for various foot shapes. That way, indoors or outdoors, you can tackle steep routes and execute tricky moves with confidence. Easy to use and slip on or off, the Tarantulas an easy decision for beginners and seasoned climbers alike.

Product.Product_Name: Scarpa - Reflex V Women - 41 Black/Ceramic
Product.Long_Description: Featuring a highly breathable, stretch-knit upper combined with a microfiber footbed wrapping the big toe, the Reflex V has been designed with comfort, performance, and affordability in mind. With a flat and neutral shape, the Reflex V has been constructed to meet the needs of modern indoor climbers.

Product.Product_Name: La Sportiva - Finale - 46.5 Aloe/Moss
Product.Long_Description: Entry-level made in Italy model ideal for both indoor and outdoor climbing. This comfortable shoe is the perfect choice for climbing long routes. Excellent price/quality ratio. The Finale model is snug fitting, comfortable and easy to put on. The heel strap tension has been minimised to enhance comfort even after several hours. The uppers are extremely breathable thanks to the central perforated panel. The boot uses a 5mm Vibram XS Edge sole for maximum durability.

Product.Product_Name: Scarpa - Vapor - 35 Dust Gray/Aqua
Product.Long_Description: A precise, versatile and best-selling shoe that marries a comfortable fit with steep climbing performance, the Vapor Womens features fresh colors, a microfiber upper and our Bi-Tension active rand for a premium combo of durability and sensitivity. The Vapor Womens features a modified fit to better suit lower volume feet and also utilizes softer and sticker XS Grip 2 rubber.

Product.Product_Name: LA SPORTIVA - ARAGON WOMENS - 41.5 - Clayhibiscus
Product.Long_Description: A climbing shoe with double hook & loop closure fastening, ideal for beginners and for all climbers who need a product that is comfortable and quick to put on. Perfect for use on indoor climbing walls.

Product.Product_Name: Scarpa - Helix - 39 Hyper Blue
Product.Long_Description: The Scarpa Helix rock climbing shoe is a comfortable all-around shoe for beginner or intermediate climbers that delivers performance and comfort at a great price.

Product.Product_Name: La Sportiva - Tarantula Boulder - 39.5 Metal/Sunset
Product.Long_Description: The best-selling Tarantula climbing shoe is reinvigorated with additional features to help beginner climbers focus on bouldering and more complex climbing movements. Additional Toe Rubber increases durability and Toe-hooking capabilities, and an updated heel helps facilitate heel hooking. User profile: For beginners looking to engage and excel quickly, this responsive and unstructured shoe now offers additional technology to help facilitate advanced movements and techniques.

Product.Product_Name: Scarpa - Helix Wmns - 39.5 Mandarin Red
Product.Long_Description: Comfortable, durable and undeniably classic, the flat-lasted Helix combines elemental yet refined features to yield one of Scarpas most popular shoes. With a highly adjustable lace-up construction, padded tongue and relatively symmetrical profile, the Helix is perfect for guides, advancing climbers and anyone prioritizing all-day comfort.

Product.Product_Name: La Sportiva - Tarantulace Womens - 38.5 Topaz/Red Plum
Product.Long_Description: For those in the market for a more forgiving fit, La Sportivas Tarantulace climbing shoes for women might be whats needed. Their supportive, asymmetrical shape, roomy toe box, and unlined leather upper will mitigate strain so you can climb longer in comfort. Its durable rubber heel and FriXion RS rubber are sticky and provided a powerful edging platform. Made for indoor and outdoor climbers alike, the Tarantulacell get you scaling projects with confidence after a quick pull of its lacing harness.

Product.Product_Name: SCARPA - ORIGIN W - 37.5 - Maldive/Black
Product.Long_Description: The starting point in your climbing career is of fundamental importance. It gives rise to the genetic building blocks that shape your climbing life. The Origin offers a lush leather upper, giving a feeling of padded luxury that is rarely found in a shoe aimed at encouraging people to start climbing. The flat profile and relatively relaxed randing ease the climbers feet into a cocoon of comfort. The hook-and-loop closure keeps the foot snug and well positioned during use. The Origin introduces SCARPAs Vision rubber, a proprietary compound that is both sticky and resilient to all the conditions that new climbers feet will experience.

Product.Product_Name: Scarpa - Force V - 36 Mangrove/Papaya
Product.Long_Description: Bringing high-performance features to a flat, less aggressive last, the redesigned Force V features a softer, more compact construction that strikes the perfect balance between all-day comfort and climbing performance.

Product.Product_Name: LA SPORTIVA - NEPAL CUBE GTX MENS - 41 - Yellow
Product.Long_Description: The Nepal Cube GTX is a warm and technical mountaineering boot designed to provide a lightweight yet robust boot to tackle big peaks, mixed terrain, glacier travel and vertical ice. Offering features like the carbon tech honeycomb insole, an insulated comfort Gore-Tex membrane and a removable and adjustable tongue, the Nepal Cubes provides a secure and precise fit to optimize your objective.

Product.Product_Name: SCARPA - VAPOR V MENS - 38.5 - Ocean/Yellow
Product.Long_Description: The Scarpa Vapor V is perfect for the climber needing that performance edge out of changing terrain. From slabs to steep, this climbing shoe hooks and claws down on overhanging terrain. The Vapor Vs synthetic upper holds its shape when you use it while the leatherback molds to the shape of your heel, great for all day use. The womens specific fit of the Vapor V from Scarpa has a narrower last in the heel and a lower volume in the forefoot. A great climbing shoe for any climber who has a smaller and lower volume foot but is also looking for that performance quality Scarpa brings to all their climbing shoes Not sure if these are for you? Check out How to Choose Rock Climbing Shoes to see if the Scarpa Vapor Vs have what you need from your next climbing shoe.

Product.Product_Name: Scarpa - Mont Blanc GTX Mtneering Boots - 39.5 Mango
Product.Long_Description: Classic mountaineering, high altitude with snow, working in winter conditions.
Product.Google_Categorization: Apparel & Accessories > Shoes > Outdoor Shoes > Hiking Shoes

Product.Product_Name: Scarpa - Origin Wmns - 34 Green Blue/Smoke
Product.Long_Description: With a flat-lasted profile, sticky yet durable VisionTM rubber sole, and a plush leather upper that gives the feeling of padded luxury and attention to detail rarely found in a shoe designed for newer climbers, the Origin provides an ideal introduction to climbing. The best-selling Origin has been updated with improved aesthetics, an updated fit that improves comfort at the widest point of the foot, and our PAF heel system.

Product.Product_Name: La Sportiva - Tarantula Boulder - 42 Metal/Sunset
Product.Long_Description: The best-selling Tarantula climbing shoe is reinvigorated with additional features to help beginner climbers focus on bouldering and more complex climbing movements. Additional Toe Rubber increases durability and Toe-hooking capabilities, and an updated heel helps facilitate heel hooking. User profile: For beginners looking to engage and excel quickly, this responsive and unstructured shoe now offers additional technology to help facilitate advanced movements and techniques.

Product.Product_Name: La Sportiva - Tarantula - 42 Black/Poppy
Product.Long_Description: The La Sportiva Tarantula climbing shoes will get you scaling projects like its namesake, without all the extra appendages. Climbers will enjoy the comfortable fit and performance of its unlined asymmetrical shape and ultra-thin synthetic fiber-laminate midsole that provide torsional support for various foot shapes. That way, indoors or outdoors, you can tackle steep routes and execute tricky moves with confidence. Easy to use and slip on or off, the Tarantulas an easy decision for beginners and seasoned climbers alike.

Product.Product_Name: Oboz - Womens Jeannette Low - 11 Regular Forest Shadow
Product.Long_Description: A low-key color palette comes together with easy stretch lacing for a casual shoe that works as hard as you do. Named in honor of Montanas Jeannette Rankinthe first woman ever elected to U.S. Congress, in 1916the Oboz Jeannette brings together REPREVE recycled fibers with a suede outer and sturdy nubuck leather rand. Rough-out suede leather and deboss detailing round out the finish for a fine-tuned style that doesnt get left behind by function.

Product.Product_Name: BLACK DIAMOND - CIRCUIT W - 7 - Anthracite Bordeaux
Product.Long_Description: Engineered for ultimate comfort, the Black Diamond Womens Circuit is stylistically sharp, super sticky, and ultra-durable, making for a performance lifestyle shoe thats equally at home at the gym, crag, or bar. Featuring a breathable knit upper for temperature control and a low-rise, collapsible heal that can easily flip down for a slip-on feel, the Circuit can also handle approaches thanks to its BlackLabel-Street sticky rubber outsole. Rubber toe protection adds security, and the webbing loops allow for various tagging and stowing options for when the trail ends and the climbing begins.
Product.Google_Categorization: Apparel & Accessories > Shoes > Outdoor Shoes > Hiking Shoes

Product.Product_Name: Scarpa - Gecko Wmn - 41 Ice Fall/Coral Red
Product.Long_Description: A longtime athlete and staff favorite, the Gecko is Scarpas most technical approach shoe. The upper is water-resistant suede leather, to withstand the abuse of rocky terrain, but still molds to your foot for a glove-like fit. A lace-to-toe closure system is super adaptable, whether you want to cinch it down for technical terrain or back it off for more casual use, and also accommodates a variety of foot shapes. The rubber toe rand is overlasted, protecting the upper as well as the midsole from abrasion. The Gecko features a hybrid construction: board lasted in the rear part for structure and torsional stability, and slip-lasted in the forefoot for ultimate flexibility and sensitivity. The dual-density EVA midsole balances support with cushioning, appropriate for moderate to long approaches wearing a pack. The new PRESA sole has a medium density compressed EVA midsole with solid and compact look. The outsole is made in SuperGum compoung, able to combine and extraordinary grip and durability. The large climbing zones offer excellent sensitivity, grip, and accurate percision.

Product.Product_Name: Salewa - Wildfire Canvas Womens - 6.5 Onyx/Black
Product.Long_Description: Whether trekking around the Tre Cime or relaxing in the Alpe di Siusi, this womens low-cut shoe is most definitely at home in the Dolomites and will cope with everything from light hiking to easy climbing. The cooling, breathable recycled cotton and hemp canvas upper is protected by a full 360 TPU rand. The 3F system and Pomoca outsole offer a secure fit and good grip during light approach activities. The 3F system with nylon-coated Kevlar cables provides additional support and greater stability at the heel, while ensuring a precise fit. And the dual-density eco Ortholite footbed promotes superior cushioning and freshness. This shoe represents Salewas commitment to sustainable manufacturing. The lightest member of their Wildfire family for cool feet during summer hiking with climbing capability.

Product.Product_Name: Salewa - Womens Mtn Trainer Lite GTX - 8 Wallnut/Fluo Coral
Product.Long_Description: The Salewa Womens Mountain Trainer GTX Hiking Shoe lives for ridgeline scrambles and technical ascents on exposed faces. Taking all the burly ingredients of Salewas mountaineering boots and implementing them in a low-top hiking shoe, the Mountain Trainer delivers all the rigidity and support youd expect from an alpine boot but in a more nimble design.
Product.Google_Categorization: Apparel & Accessories > Shoes > Outdoor Shoes > Hiking Shoes

Product.Product_Name: Mammut - Ducan High GTX Men - 11.5 Black-Black
Product.Long_Description: From short hikes to multi-day tours, this boot keeps all your options open and is backed by the latest technologies to do so. Putting the literal spring in your step, Mammut Flextrontechnology uses a spring-steel sole to provide effective shock absorption, energy transfer, and stability to support your natural stride. Meanwhile, a reliable grip is provided by the Vibram outer sole and a trusted GORE-TEX membrane keeps you protected from adverse weather. All this in an anatomically tailored design for a comfortable, precise fit. The Ducan collection a classic for a reason.
Product.Google_Categorization: Apparel & Accessories > Shoes > Outdoor Shoes > Hiking Shoes

Product.Product_Name: Oboz - Sypes Mid Leather Waterproof - 9 Wide Peppercorn
Product.Long_Description: The Womens Oboz Sypes shoes rock a mid-height cuff thatll lend plenty of freedom for all-day trail hiking. Its constructed with a B-Dry Waterproof nubuck leather thats breathable and will keep feet dry. Meanwhile, its construction below is comprised of materials that rebound, grip, and support you on every step taken in a breadth of terrain. The midsole in particular utilizes ACT Intelligent PU technology and an asymmetrical anatomical TPU heel clip. From rocky terrain to the pavement, the Oboz Sypess got the hardware to keep you going.

Product.Product_Name: Oboz - Womens Sypes Low Leather WP - 5.5 Regular Black Sea
Product.Long_Description: Low-profile, lightweight and stylish enough to take you from the trailhead to your favorite watering hole and everywhere in between. Designed for maximum support, comfort and versatility and built with a gender-specific fit, sustainable materials and B-DRY waterproofing so you can feel good, every step of the way.

Product.Product_Name: The North Face - Mens Oxeye - 8.5 New Taupe Green/Deep Grass Green
Product.Long_Description: Versatile, lightweight, and trail-capable, the North Face Mens Oxeye Shoes will be your new go-to everyday hikers. An innovative design allows these shoes to go off the trail and into the city.

Product.Product_Name: Hoka - W Anacapa 2 Mid GTX - 6 Regular Mountain Fog / Droplet
Product.Long_Description: Scrutinized through the lens of sustainability, Hokas reimagined their beloved Anacapa Mid GTX with a renewed focus on earth-conscious materials. Updated with recycled yarn meshes, theyve enlisted a 30% sugarcane EVA midsole and Vibram Megagrip outsole. Finished with metal speed hooks and a rubber toe cap, theres no telling where this hiker will take you.

The cooling, breathable recycled cotton and hemp canvas upper is protected by a full 360 TPU rand. The 3F system and Pomoca outsole offer a secure fit and good grip during light approach activities. Product.Product_Name: Salewa - Wildfire Canvas Womens - 7 Oatmeal/Black
Product.Long_Description: Whether trekking around the Tre Cime or relaxing in the Alpe di Siusi, this womens low-cut shoe is most definitely at home in the Dolomites and will cope with everything from light hiking to easy climbing. The cooling, breathable recycled cotton and hemp canvas upper is protected by a full 360 TPU rand. The 3F system and Pomoca outsole offer a secure fit and good grip during light approach activities. Product.Product_Name: Salewa - Mens Dropline Leather - 8.5 Black/Pale Frog
Product.Long_Description: The Salewa Dropline Leather is a highly comfortable shoe that is designed for versatile use, from everyday use to speed hiking activitiesThe upper is made in a high-quality, soft, and robust 1.4-millimeter suede leather. It is reinforced with a PU rand for impact protection and to prevent scratches. The 3F system with nylon-coated Kevlar cables provides additional support while ensuring a precise fit and enhanced stability. At the tongue, a stretch mesh gaiter keeps out trail debris, such as grit and gravel. The Dropline Leather is built on a high-performance EVA midsole to offer optimum impact cushioning giving you a softer landing to enjoy longer activities. Underfoot, the self-cleaning POMOCA outsole performs well, offering solid, reliable grip and good traction with self-cleaning lugs. During movement, the S-Path design of the sole enables a more natural roll-off and smoother heel-to-toe transition. In addition, the customizable SALEWA Multi Fit Footbed Plus (MFF+) has interchangeable layers that allow you to further fine-tune the inner volume of your shoes. The Dropline Leather is an agile and comfortable shoe with a speed hiking spec with great cushioning and support, for versatile hiking activities.

Product.Product_Name: Oboz - Womens Sypes Low Leather WP - Peppercorn 9 Regular
Product.Long_Description: Low-profile, lightweight and stylish enough to take you from the trailhead to your favorite watering hole and everywhere in between. Designed for maximum support, comfort and versatility and built with a gender-specific fit, sustainable materials and B-DRY waterproofing so you can feel good, every step of the way.

Product.Product_Name: Salewa - Womens Wildfire Edge - 8.5 Malta/Vivacious
Product.Long_Description: The Wildfire Edge is a technical approach shoe that can be adapted from hiking mode to climbing mode. Designed together with mountain guides and top climbers in the Dolomites, the Salewa Switchfit system is as simple as it is smart. Simply tighten the laces at the rear eyelet and then do them up. This way, you pull your foot forward into the toebox, compressing your toes similar to a climbing shoe. Once youve finished climbing, loosen the laces at the rear eyelet for a roomier toebox and greater hiking comfort. To further enhance climbing precision, the Wildfire Edges insole also incorporates an Edging Plate right under the toes for additional, directional stiffness, while the rest of the insole remains flexible to ensure good comfort and a natural rolling motion. For enhanced grip and friction in both dry and wet conditions, the Pomoca Speed MTN sole is made from Butilic Compound. The sole has a precision climbing zone at the toe, good edging performance and aggressive lugs for improved traction on mud and soft terrain. For enhanced torsional stability, the Exa Shell works together with the 3F System to wrap the foot for flexibility, fit and support. Climbing Lacing extends right to the toe for a more precise fit and greater adjustment. The Multi Fit Footbed Plus (MFF+) uses interchangeable layers so you can adapt it to the unique shape of your foot, supporting SALEWAs trademark Alpine Fit 100% blister free guarantee.

Product.Product_Name: The North Face - Mens Truckee - 12.5 Khaki Stone/TNF Black
Product.Long_Description: Boldly step into some on-trail exploration in the North Face Mens Truckee. This sneaker-style hiking shoe features a rugged outsole and a mixed-material upper that is highly abrasion-resistant.

Product.Product_Name: The North Face - Men's Activist Mid FUTURELIGHT - 12 TNF Black/Zinc Grey
Product.Long_Description: The Activist Mid pairs progressive styling with modern fabrics and construction to create a lightweight, trail-ready boot with sneaker-like comfort.
Product.Google_Categorization: Apparel & Accessories > Shoes > Outdoor Shoes > Hiking Shoes

Product.Product_Name: Black Diamond - Technician Leather Approach Shoes - 7
Product.Long_Description: Engineered for precision, the Black Diamond Technician Leather is built for durability and comfort, with super sticky rubber for technical approaches. Featuring a premium suede leather upper thats lined for fit and comfort, the Technician Leather is ultra-durable with strategically placed, welded TPU overlays for abuse on the rocks. The lightweight wrap-style tongue allows for easy on and off at the crag, and a graduated lace system goes all the way to the toe for a lockdown fit. The Technician Leathers tuned EVA midsole consists of a strategic stiffness-to-comfort ratio, allowing for high-performance precision where you need it, and comfort in just the right spots. The last is ideal for technical climbing, as the name implies, and the shoes BlackLabel-Mountain rubber provides super sticky, ultimate grip on terrain that demands precise edging and smearing you can trust your life to. Finally, the Technician Leathers multiple webbing loops offer various tagging and stowing options for when the approach ends and the hard climbing begins.
Product.Google_Categorization: Apparel & Accessories > Shoes > Outdoor Shoes > Hiking Shoes

Product.Product_Name: Salewa - Mens Mtn Trainer Lite - 12.5 Malta/Fluo Green
Product.Long_Description: The Mens Salewa MTN Trainer Lite is built to provide lightweight comfort, grip, and stability for alpine approach and mountain use. It has a robust fabric upper that fits well straight out of the box. The lasted construction and molded EVA midsole create a stiff midfoot with a flexible forefoot for moving quickly in rough terrain. This shoe is also engineered with our proprietary 3F system that connects the instep, sole, and heel for additional ankle support. The heel stabilizer and rubber toe cap also add further protection. Underfoot, the durable outsole has deep aggressive lugs to ensure reliable traction while the Pomoca compound rubber is grippy enough for scrambling both on wet and dry rock. The climbing lacing allows you to fine-tune right down to the toe for greater precision in technical rocky terrain. Designed in Italy, the mens MTN Trainer Lite is the perfect summer hiker with the technical pedigree for rugged, alpine use.

Product.Product_Name: Oboz - Katabatic Mid Waterproof - 9 Regular Island
Product.Long_Description: Light enough to move fast on the trails yet built for wet weather, the womens Oboz Katabatic Mid B-Dry hiking boots are breathable, waterproof and supportive, so you can comfortably put in the miles.

Product.Product_Name: Adidas - Womens Terrex AX4 - 7 Core Black/Grey Three/Mint Ton
Product.Long_Description: The outdoors is made for exploring, and these adidas Terrex hiking shoes are built to explore high and low, near and far. Their multi-sport design is light enough for day hikes and technical enough for alpine scrambles and via ferratas. They support your feet with a lightweight yet rugged and stable feel, so you can focus on your route. A gusseted tongue and padded cuff hug the foot and seal out dust and debris for running-shoe-inspired comfort. The all-conditions grip of Continental Rubber means you can move with confidence across rocky scree, wet roots and loose, dusty trails. Lace up, and get out there.
Product.Google_Categorization: Apparel & Accessories > Shoes > Outdoor Shoes > Hiking Shoes

Product.Product_Name: Mammut - Sertig II Low GTX - 9.5 Terracotta-Blood Red
Product.Long_Description: The Womens Mammut Sertig II Low Gore-Tex is a lightweight and robust multi-purpose shoe designed for your active lifestyle. The high stack height in combination with the strong EVA midsole gives the shoe outstanding damping properties. The sole featuring the Mammut Swiss Design rubber blend provides grip you can rely on. A stable, comfortable, and stylish shoe offering outstanding value for money. Gore-Tex Invisible Fit technology further enhances comfort, thanks to a protective membrane integrated in the upper material. This saves weight, reduces pressure points, and ensures durable waterproofing. For dry feet on your next tour.

Product.Product_Name: The North Face - Mens Altamesa 500 - 10.5 TNF Black/Asphalt Grey
Product.Long_Description: Designed in collaboration with The North Face athlete team, the Mens Altamesa 500 are highly cushioned and stable performance training shoes for trail running. They feature TNFs DREAM midsole foam for a soft and light feel and trail-tuned SURFACE CTRL rubber outsoles, so youll be ready whether youre running on gravel paths or mountains trails.

Product.Long_Description: Comfortable, flexible and supportive the Salewa MTN Trainer 2 is a versatile low-cut alpine approach shoe with a high-quality 1.6-millimetre suede leather upper and a Vibram outsole. Inside, the waterproof GORE-TEX Extended Comfort membrane lets your feet breathe while protecting them from the elements and the soft textile lining fabric wicks moisture away for additional comfort. In addition, the expanded PU midsole provides long-lasting shock absorbency and rebound, helping decrease foot fatigue. Salewa also gives the high-quality upper a full 360 protective rubber rand for abrasion resistance and to protect your feet in rocky terrain. Underfoot, the multifunctional Vibram outsole gives agility and stability in rugged terrain. Its self-cleaning grooves and deep lugs guarantee a good grip on rock and scree and optimal traction on softer ground, such as mud or grass. It also benefits from a special via ferrata tread zone before the heel that ensures better grip on the iron ladder rungs of via ferratas. The womens MTN Trainer 2 also incorporates our proprietary 3F system for high flexibility, a more comfortable fit and greater support. With a cushioning OrthoLite foam footbed and climbing lacing that can be customized for technical terrain or casual use. The perfect solution for alpine trekking, scrambles, and approaches on a variety of surfaces and in all weather conditions.

Product.Long_Description: The Dolomites have so many classic climbs, sometimes its hard to know where to start: Tre Cime, Marmolada, Cinque Torri, Vajolet Towers, Tofana di Rozes...Salewa makes the Wildfire 2s precise-fitting upper from robust, recycled mesh and reinforces it with a network of Kevlar cables that wraps the foot for flexibility, fit-enhanced torsional stability, and heel support. The result: better edging and smearing and overall security on technical terrain. Moreover, the Multi Fit Footbed Plus (MFF+) provides a customizable fit, for a more narrow or wider comfort. To cope with tougher weather, the Wildfire GTX has a GORE-TEX Extended Comfort lining to provide waterproof and breathable protection. The Pomoca Speed MTN outsole has a climbing zone at the toe and aggressive tread lugs for good traction on mud and softer terrain, while its S-Path technology ensures a more natural roll-off. And the sticky POMOCA rubber provides good friction in both dry and wet conditions.

Product.Product_Name: SALEWA - MTN TRAINER LT MD GTX W - 11 - Feld Green/Fluo Cora
Product.Long_Description: Made for alpine hiking and long backpacking routes our lightweight, comfortably fitting womens mid-cut shoe has a GORE-TEX membrane for durable waterproof protection without sacrificing breathability. The MTN Trainer Lite Mid is a comfortable and supportive mid-cut, 3-season boot that performs well on rock and technical terrain. Carrying more weight, means expending more energy. We strip the weight right down here by using a lightweight, but highly wear-resistant, fabric upper with suede inserts. The waterproof, breathable GORE-TEX Extended Comfort lining also makes it ideal for 3-season, alpine use from higher activity levels in summer to rain, mud or lingering snow. The fit is what sets any boot apart. Our lasted mid-cut boot construction allows enough space to comfortably accommodate your toes, whilst ensuring all-day comfort and support with the right amount of flex. Inside the heart of the shoe, the EVA midsole delivers good shock absorbency and rebound. For additional stability and protection, there is a forgiving ankle cuff, a heel stabilizer and a rubber toe cap. Underfoot, the outsole guarantees reliable grip thanks to the Pomoca compound rubber and tread pattern with deep lugs and grooves and the versatility to cope with a wide range of terrain from mud and grass to rock, ice and snow. The climbing lacing, which runs right down to the toe, allows easy customisation for greater precision in technical terrain or more relaxed wear. Our womens MTN Trainer Lite Mid is a lighter mid-top, 3-season alpine footwear solution for long-distance hikers and backpackers who want to shed weight from their feet but are not prepared to compromise on water resistance and comfort.
Product.Google_Categorization: Apparel & Accessories > Shoes > Outdoor Shoes > Hiking Shoes

Product.Product_Name: Salewa - Mens Wildfire Edge - 7 Premium Navy/Fluo Yellow
Product.Long_Description: Salewas Wildfire Edge is a technical approach shoe that can be adapted from hiking mode to climbing mode. Designed together with mountain guides and top climbers in the Dolomites, the Salewa Switchfit system is as simple as it is smart. Simply tighten the laces at the rear eyelet and then do them up. This way, you pull your foot forward into the toebox, compressing your toes similar to a climbing shoe. Once youve finished climbing, loosen the laces at the rear eyelet for a roomier toebox and greater hiking comfort. To further enhance climbing precision, the Wildfire Edges insole also incorporates an Edging Plate right under the toes for additional, directional stiffness, while the rest of the insole remains flexible to ensure good comfort and a natural rolling motion.

These hiking boots feature abrasion resistant performance mesh and a rugged suede upper for peak comfort. Plus with a dual-density EVA midsole and durable UltrATAC outsole, these boots offer excellent traction and optimal hold for a full day of hiking.

Product.Product_Name: Salomon - Quest 4 Gore-Tex - 10.5 Regular Olive Night / Peat / Safari
Product.Long_Description: Designed for long expeditions and tough conditions, the Quest is grippy and supportive. Salomon has updated the chassis to target sensitive articulations and wrap the foot for extra support, while also keeping your stride fluid. No matter how tired you are or how heavy your pack, the Quest 4 GTX ensures a stable yet smooth ride on any terrain.

Product.Product_Name: Mammut - Ducan High GTX Men - 9 Black-Black
Product.Long_Description: From short hikes to multi-day tours, this boot keeps all your options open and is backed by the latest technologies to do so. Putting the literal spring in your step, Mammut Flextrontechnology uses a spring-steel sole to provide effective shock absorption, energy transfer, and stability to support your natural stride. Meanwhile, a reliable grip is provided by the Vibram outer sole and a trusted GORE-TEX membrane keeps you protected from adverse weather. All this in an anatomically tailored design for a comfortable, precise fit. The Ducan collection a classic for a reason.
Product.Google_Categorization: Apparel & Accessories > Shoes > Outdoor Shoes > Hiking Shoes

Product.Product_Name: Oboz - Sypes Mid Leather Waterproof - 7 Regular Peppercorn
Product.Long_Description: The Womens Oboz Sypes shoes rock a mid-height cuff thatll lend plenty of freedom for all-day trail hiking. Its constructed with a B-Dry Waterproof nubuck leather thats breathable and will keep feet dry. Meanwhile, its construction below is comprised of materials that rebound, grip, and support you on every step taken in a breadth of terrain. The midsole in particular utilizes ACT Intelligent PU technology and an asymmetrical anatomical TPU heel clip. From rocky terrain to the pavement, the Oboz Sypess got the hardware to keep you going.

Product.Product_Name: Oboz - Mens Sawtooth X Mid Waterproof - 15 Regular Canteen
Product.Long_Description: The Mens Oboz Sawtooth X shoes bring ideal construction and performance for tackling trails. Right out the gate: Its got a supportive mid-rise cuff thatll help you handle heavier cargo and add a bit more warmth. Then theres the midsole. A cloud of material that cushions every footfall and adapts to varying terrain. You can thank proprietary rubberized EVA for that. Course boots cant get anywhere without a tread to walk on. The Sawtooths outsoles have traction thatll grip and guide you to greater heights with improved elongation and tensile strength. Dont sweat the weather while en route either. Thats cause this boots B-Dry waterproof upper keeps feet dry and breathing. All in all, whats not to love?

Product.Product_Name: Columbia - Womens Newton Ridge Plus Omni Heat - 9.5 Regular Wet Sand, Sea W
Product.Long_Description: The Womens Newton Ridge Plus Omni Heat is a classic waterproof-breathable hiking boot that is upgraded with Columbias thermal-reflective lining and a touch of fluffy fleece for toastier trails. The lightweight midsole is cushioned yet supportive to keep up with your most ambitious day trips. Responsive, supportive cushioning and super-grippy rubber outsoles are geared for miles over rocks, grass, gravel, and roots.
Product.Google_Categorization: Apparel & Accessories > Shoes > Outdoor Shoes > Hiking Shoes

Product.Product_Name: Oboz - Mens Sawtooth X Low - 7.5 Wide Sandhill
Product.Long_Description: Ten years ago, the Sawtooth put Oboz on the map in outdoor footwear. The new Sawtooth X retains all the things that made the original so popular with the addition of new aggressive styling and new materials like our Adaptive Cushioning Technology midsoleall you need to map out your next adventure.

Product.Product_Name: Columbia - Womens Facet Sierra Outdry Boot - 9.5 Regular Cordovan, Dusty
Product.Long_Description: The Columbia Facet Sierra Outdry Boot is a versatile and stylish shoe that can handle varied conditions and terrains. Mid-high waterproof-breathable leather uppers offer protection against the elements and ankle support. Responsive cushioning and high-grip outsoles team up for an exceptional underfoot experience.
Product.Google_Categorization: Apparel & Accessories > Shoes > Outdoor Shoes > Hiking Shoes

Product.Product_Name: Salewa - Mtn Trainer 2 Mid PTX K - 12 Flame/Flame
Product.Long_Description: Engineered in the Dolomites, the Salewa MTN Trainer 2 Mid PTX is a lightweight kids mountain hiking boot that matches a hard-wearing suede leather upper with a 360 polyurethane rand for scuff and scree protection in rugged terrain. The water-repellent, breathable and sustainable Powertex membrane is designed to also cope with wet weather and variable conditions. The SALEWA 3F System provides extra support and protection, while the Flex Collar gives enhanced flexibility at the ankle. Underfoot, the lightweight, compact Pomoca Junior Hike outsole has a special lug design for better traction and control. And the EVA midsole ensures all-day comfort on longer hikes.

Product.Product_Name: La Sportiva - Wildcat 2.0 GTX - 40.5 Regular Black/Pumpkin
Product.Long_Description: The Wildcat 2.0 GTX is a highly stable, neutral trail runner that provides excellent cushioning and a secure fit. The waterproof ePE Gore-Tex lining keeps your feet dry in wet conditions, and the aggressive outsole and supple midsole combine to ensure comfort and stability on rough trails.

Product.Product_Name: Black Diamond - Technician Leather Approach Shoes - 8
Product.Long_Description: Engineered for precision, the Black Diamond Technician Leather is built for durability and comfort, with super sticky rubber for technical approaches. Featuring a premium suede leather upper thats lined for fit and comfort, the Technician Leather is ultra-durable with strategically placed, welded TPU overlays for abuse on the rocks. The lightweight wrap-style tongue allows for easy on and off at the crag, and a graduated lace system goes all the way to the toe for a lockdown fit. The Technician Leathers tuned EVA midsole consists of a strategic stiffness-to-comfort ratio, allowing for high-performance precision where you need it, and comfort in just the right spots. The last is ideal for technical climbing, as the name implies, and the shoes BlackLabel-Mountain rubber provides super sticky, ultimate grip on terrain that demands precise edging and smearing you can trust your life to. Finally, the Technician Leathers multiple webbing loops offer various tagging and stowing options for when the approach ends and the hard climbing begins.
Product.Google_Categorization: Apparel & Accessories > Shoes > Outdoor Shoes > Hiking Shoes

Product.Product_Name: The North Face - Womens Truckee - 5 TNF Black/Vanadis Grey
Product.Long_Description: Boldly step into some on-trail exploration in the Womens North Face Truckee. This sneaker-style hiking shoe features a rugged outsole and a mixed-material upper that is highly abrasion-resistant.

Product.Product_Name: Salewa - Mens Mtn Trainer 2 - 9.5 Black/Black
Product.Long_Description: This updated version of Salewas classic MTN Trainer is designed in Montebelluna, the small town at the foothills of the Dolomites famous for mountain footwear. Its a robust, versatile low-cut alpine approach shoe with a 1.6-millimeter suede upper and a Vibram outsole made for prolonged heavy use. The hard-wearing leather upper has a full protective rubber rand for 360 abrasion resistance in rocky terrain and a breathable mesh lining. The improved lasted construction ensures a comfortable and more flexible fit, while the medium-stiff nylon midsole is supportive at the midfoot, but still allows good flex at the forefoot for moving faster in rough terrain. The multifunctional Vibram MTN Trainer Evo outsole has deep, self-cleaning grooves and aggressive lugs that guarantee a good grip on rock and scree and optimal traction on mud and grass. A special via ferrata zone under the midfoot, before the heel, has special right-angled lugs for better grip on the iron rungs of via ferrata ladders. Salewas signature 3F system connects the instep area with the sole and heel for flexibility, correct fit, and support. The climbing lacing system can be fine-tuned at the toe for greater climbing precision, while the stretch gaiter under the laces offers additional weather protection. And the cushioning OrthoLite footbed wicks away moisture to keep your feet cool. The mens MTN Trainer 2 is a comfortable alpine approach solution for technical hikes, via ferratas and treks.

Product.Product_Name: La Sportiva - Wildcat 2.0 Gtx - 40 Regular Garden/Forest
Product.Long_Description: The Wildcat 2.0 GTX is a highly stable, neutral trail runner that provides excellent cushioning and a secure fit. The waterproof ePE Gore-Tex lining keeps your feet dry in wet conditions, and the aggressive outsole and supple midsole combine to ensure comfort and stability on rough trails.

Product.Product_Name: Oboz - Womens Jeannette Low - 5 Regular Yukon
Product.Long_Description: A low-key color palette comes together with easy stretch lacing for a casual shoe that works as hard as you do. Named in honor of Montanas Jeannette Rankinthe first woman ever elected to U.S. Congress, in 1916the Oboz Jeannette brings together REPREVE recycled fibers with a suede outer and sturdy nubuck leather rand. Rough-out suede leather and deboss detailing round out the finish for a fine-tuned style that doesnt get left behind by function.

Product.Product_Name: SALEWA - MTN TRAINER LITE GTX W - 10 - Feld Green/Fluo Cora
Product.Long_Description: The Salewa Womens Mountain Trainer GTX Hiking Shoe lives for ridgeline scrambles and technical ascents on exposed faces. Taking all the burly ingredients of Salewas mountaineering boots and implementing them in a low-top hiking shoe, the Mountain Trainer delivers all the rigidity and support youd expect from an alpine boot but in a more nimble design.

Product.Product_Name: Hoka - W Anacapa 2 Mid GTX - 6.5 Regular Mountain Fog / Droplet
Product.Long_Description: Scrutinized through the lens of sustainability, Hokas reimagined their beloved Anacapa Mid GTX with a renewed focus on earth-conscious materials. Updated with recycled yarn meshes, theyve enlisted a 30% sugarcane EVA midsole and Vibram Megagrip outsole. Product.Product_Name: Salewa - Wildfire 2 GTX Mens - 11 Fluo Orange/Black
Product.Long_Description: The Dolomites have so many classic climbs, sometimes its hard to know where to start: Tre Cime, Marmolada, Cinque Torri, Vajolet Towers, Tofana di Rozes...Salewa makes the Wildfire 2s precise-fitting upper from robust, recycled mesh and reinforces it with a network of Kevlar cables that wraps the foot for flexibility, fit-enhanced torsional stability, and heel support. Whats more, the Wildfire 2 switches quickly and easily from hiking mode to climbing mode using the SALEWA Switchfit adjustment system. The result: better edging and smearing and overall security on technical terrain. Moreover, the Multi Fit Footbed Plus (MFF+) provides a customizable fit, for a more narrow or wider comfort. To cope with tougher weather, the Wildfire GTX has a GORE-TEX Extended Comfort lining to provide waterproof and breathable protection. The Pomoca Speed MTN outsole has a climbing zone at the toe and aggressive tread lugs for good traction on mud and softer terrain, while its S-Path technology ensures a more natural roll-off. And the sticky POMOCA rubber provides good friction in both dry and wet conditions.

Product.Product_Name: Forsake - Womens Thatcher Mid - 9.5 Black
Product.Long_Description: No matter where youre headed, the Thatcher Mid is ready. The waterproof and breathable membrane adds all-weather protection to a premium full grain leather upper, while a cushioned EVA midsole and our Peak-to-Pavement traction keep you prepared for whatever adventure lies ahead.

Product.Product_Name: Vasque - Breeze - 6 Regular Rum Raisin
Product.Long_Description: The Womens Breeze is the most beloved Vasque boot of the last two decades. As Vasques continued to push the envelope of what the Breeze can be, theyve gone back to the classic design principles that made the original Breeze a boot that hiked all over the world. Theyve taken the best elements that each former Breeze has provided modernized the design approach, and introduced sustainable, durable materials at every turn to deliver a modern adaptation of a classic boot that has defined a generation of outdoor exploration. The Breeze is the first style to debut VasqueDry, which promises to deliver trusted waterproofing and is derived from 25% recycled materials. Tried and true, this boot has been relentlessly tested throughout its development to ensure it is packed with the comfort and durability that many have come to rely on from the Breeze.

Product.Product_Name: Salewa - Womens Crow GTX - 8 Premium Navy/Ethernal Blue
Product.Long_Description: The Crow GTX is a versatile mountaineering boot with an abrasion-resistant fabric upper and waterproof GORE-TEX protection. Designed for mixed use on general alpine terrain and alpine trekking, the Crow GTX has a crampon-compatible Vibram New Mulaz sole for semi-automatic crampons that offers grip on rock and traction in mixed mountain terrain and snow. The GORE-TEX Performance Comfort lining delivers optimized climate comfort should the weather close in on you and theres a full rubber rand for protection against rock and scree. The Crow GTX integrates SALEWA technologies to offer the Alpine Fit 100% blister free guarantee: 3F System for firm ankle and heel support, Climbing system to ensure that it fits perfectly around your foot and Flex Collar for comfort during descents.

Product.Product_Name: Mammut - Ducan Mid GTX Women - 8.5 Phantom-Light Galaxy
Product.Long_Description: From short hikes to multi-day tours, this mid-cut boot keeps all your options open and is backed by the latest technologies to do so. Product.Product_Name: The North Face - Womens Cragstone Leather Mid WP - 9.5 Bipartisan Brown/Meld Grey
Product.Long_Description: Designed for the next generation of adventure seekers, the North Face multifunctional Womens Cragstone Leather Mid Waterproof Boots combine a lightweight waterproof hiker with a sneaker-boot thats made to wear every day.

Product.Product_Name: Salewa - Womens Wildfire Edge - 7.5 Malta/Vivacious
Product.Long_Description: The Wildfire Edge is a technical approach shoe that can be adapted from hiking mode to climbing mode. Designed together with mountain guides and top climbers in the Dolomites, the Salewa Switchfit system is as simple as it is smart. Simply tighten the laces at the rear eyelet and then do them up. This way, you pull your foot forward into the toebox, compressing your toes similar to a climbing shoe. Once youve finished climbing, loosen the laces at the rear eyelet for a roomier toebox and greater hiking comfort. To further enhance climbing precision, the Wildfire Edges insole also incorporates an Edging Plate right under the toes for additional, directional stiffness, while the rest of the insole remains flexible to ensure good comfort and a natural rolling motion. For enhanced grip and friction in both dry and wet conditions, the Pomoca Speed MTN sole is made from Butilic Compound. The sole has a precision climbing zone at the toe, good edging performance and aggressive lugs for improved traction on mud and soft terrain. For enhanced torsional stability, the Exa Shell works together with the 3F System to wrap the foot for flexibility, fit and support. Climbing Lacing extends right to the toe for a more precise fit and greater adjustment. The Multi Fit Footbed Plus (MFF+) uses interchangeable layers so you can adapt it to the unique shape of your foot, supporting SALEWAs trademark Alpine Fit 100% blister free guarantee.

Product.Product_Name: Oboz - Womens Sawtooth X Low Waterproof - 6 Wide Lupine
Product.Long_Description: Ride like the wind over the ebb and flow of nature in the Oboz Womens Sawtooth X. Low-rise, supportive trail shoes that have all the features of high-performance footwear. Its waterproof and breathable construction comes courtesy of B-Dry technology. Proprietary rubberized EVA found in the midsole means you get from A to B in comfort no matter the topography. And the outsole is able to grip terrain and mitigate slippage. The end result? A boot thatll keep you dry and comfortable throughout your hikes over trails less traveled.

Product.Product_Name: LA SPORTIVA - WILDCAT 2.0 GTX - 41.5 - Blackpumpkin
Product.Long_Description: The Wildcat 2.0 GTX is a highly stable, neutral trail runner that provides excellent cushioning and a secure fit. Product.Product_Name: Salewa - Mens Dropline Leather - 10 Black/Pale Frog
Product.Long_Description: The Salewa Dropline Leather is a highly comfortable shoe that is designed for versatile use, from everyday use to speed hiking activitiesThe upper is made in a high-quality, soft, and robust 1.4-millimeter suede leather. It is reinforced with a PU rand for impact protection and to prevent scratches. The 3F system with nylon-coated Kevlar cables provides additional support while ensuring a precise fit and enhanced stability. At the tongue, a stretch mesh gaiter keeps out trail debris, such as grit and gravel. The Dropline Leather is built on a high-performance EVA midsole to offer optimum impact cushioning giving you a softer landing to enjoy longer activities. Underfoot, the self-cleaning POMOCA outsole performs well, offering solid, reliable grip and good traction with self-cleaning lugs. During movement, the S-Path design of the sole enables a more natural roll-off and smoother heel-to-toe transition. In addition, the customizable SALEWA Multi Fit Footbed Plus (MFF+) has interchangeable layers that allow you to further fine-tune the inner volume of your shoes. The Dropline Leather is an agile and comfortable shoe with a speed hiking spec with great cushioning and support, for versatile hiking activities.

Product.Product_Name: Mammut - Saentis Low Women - 7.5 Black-Whisper
Product.Long_Description: A lightweight that is hard to beat when it comes to flexibility and versatility: the Saentis Low Women is a multipurpose shoe with many faces. It is most at home on fast-paced narrow forest trails, but is also sure to become your lightweight and reliable favorite shoe for the mountains. Its Michelin sole gives it excellent trip and an optimum sure-footed step on uneven surfaces, while the impressively robust mesh material provides extreme breathability for pleasant comfort.

The Technician Leathers tuned EVA midsole consists of a strategic stiffness-to-comfort ratio, allowing for high-performance precision where you need it, and comfort in just the right spots. The last is ideal for technical climbing, as the name implies, and the shoes BlackLabel-Mountain rubber provides super sticky, ultimate grip on terrain that demands precise edging and smearing you can trust your life to. Finally, the Technician Leathers multiple webbing loops offer various tagging and stowing options for when the approach ends and the hard climbing begins.
Product.Google_Categorization: Apparel & Accessories > Shoes > Outdoor Shoes > Hiking Shoes

Product.Product_Name: La Sportiva - Wildcat 2.0 Gtx - 40.5 Regular Garden/Forest
Product.Long_Description: The Wildcat 2.0 GTX is a highly stable, neutral trail runner that provides excellent cushioning and a secure fit. Product.Product_Name: Salewa - Mens Wildfire Edge - 12.5 Wallnut/Fluo Orange
Product.Long_Description: Salewas Wildfire Edge is a technical approach shoe that can be adapted from hiking mode to climbing mode. Designed together with mountain guides and top climbers in the Dolomites, the Salewa Switchfit system is as simple as it is smart. Simply tighten the laces at the rear eyelet and then do them up. This way, you pull your foot forward into the toebox, compressing your toes similar to a climbing shoe. Once youve finished climbing, loosen the laces at the rear eyelet for a roomier toebox and greater hiking comfort. To further enhance climbing precision, the Wildfire Edges insole also incorporates an Edging Plate right under the toes for additional, directional stiffness, while the rest of the insole remains flexible to ensure good comfort and a natural rolling motion.

Product.Product_Name: Oboz - Womens Sapphire Mid Waterproof - 7 Regular Huckleberry
