Product.Product_Name: Salewa - Womens Mtn Trainer 2 GTX - 7.5 Black/Bungee Cord
Product.Long_Description: Comfortable, flexible and supportive the Salewa MTN Trainer 2 is a versatile low-cut alpine approach shoe with a high-quality 1.6-millimetre suede leather upper and a Vibram outsole. Inside, the waterproof GORE-TEX Extended Comfort membrane lets your feet breathe while protecting them from the elements and the soft textile lining fabric wicks moisture away for additional comfort. There is also a protective stretch gaiter under the laces to keep rain and groundwater out. Designed in Montebelluna, the cradle of alpine footwear craftsmanship, this shoe has a unique lasted construction that is 15% lighter than the original. The womens specific fit with contoured heel cups holds your feet comfortably in place and prevents slippage for more stability on descents. In addition, the expanded PU midsole provides long-lasting shock absorbency and rebound, helping decrease foot fatigue. Salewa also gives the high-quality upper a full 360 protective rubber rand for abrasion resistance and to protect your feet in rocky terrain. Underfoot, the multifunctional Vibram outsole gives agility and stability in rugged terrain. Its self-cleaning grooves and deep lugs guarantee a good grip on rock and scree and optimal traction on softer ground, such as mud or grass. It also benefits from a special via ferrata tread zone before the heel that ensures better grip on the iron ladder rungs of via ferratas. The womens MTN Trainer 2 also incorporates our proprietary 3F system for high flexibility, a more comfortable fit and greater support. With a cushioning OrthoLite foam footbed and climbing lacing that can be customized for technical terrain or casual use. The perfect solution for alpine trekking, scrambles, and approaches on a variety of surfaces and in all weather conditions.
Product.Google_Categorization: Apparel & Accessories > Shoes > Outdoor Shoes > Hiking Shoes

Salomon has updated the chassis to target sensitive articulations and wrap the foot for extra support, while also keeping your stride fluid. No matter how tired you are or how heavy your pack, the Quest 4 GTX ensures a stable yet smooth ride on any terrain.

Product.Product_Name: Salewa - Mens Dropline Leather - 8 Black/Pale Frog
Product.Long_Description: The Salewa Dropline Leather is a highly comfortable shoe that is designed for versatile use, from everyday use to speed hiking activitiesThe upper is made in a high-quality, soft, and robust 1.4-millimeter suede leather. It is reinforced with a PU rand for impact protection and to prevent scratches. The 3F system with nylon-coated Kevlar cables provides additional support while ensuring a precise fit and enhanced stability. At the tongue, a stretch mesh gaiter keeps out trail debris, such as grit and gravel. The Dropline Leather is built on a high-performance EVA midsole to offer optimum impact cushioning giving you a softer landing to enjoy longer activities. Underfoot, the self-cleaning POMOCA outsole performs well, offering solid, reliable grip and good traction with self-cleaning lugs. During movement, the S-Path design of the sole enables a more natural roll-off and smoother heel-to-toe transition. In addition, the customizable SALEWA Multi Fit Footbed Plus (MFF+) has interchangeable layers that allow you to further fine-tune the inner volume of your shoes. The Dropline Leather is an agile and comfortable shoe with a speed hiking spec with great cushioning and support, for versatile hiking activities.

Product.Product_Name: The North Face - Womens Storm Strike III WP - 9.5 Deep Taupe/TNF Black
Product.Long_Description: Whether muddy trails or slippy rocks, The North Face Storm Strike III Hiking Boots are always one step ahead. This new iteration features a waterproof DryVent bootie construction and a rugged outsole to block out moisture and take you through snow, mud, and rain with confidence. But thats not at the expense of comfort: theres a super-soft padded collar for all-day comfort while you hotfoot it over challenging terrain. Even better, synthetic insulation retains heat to keep you warm, even in freezing cold conditions on the trail.

Product.Product_Name: The North Face - Mens Hedgehog 3 WP - 9.5 New Taupe Green/TNF Black
Product.Long_Description: An update to a classic, the Mens Hedgehog 3 Waterproof Shoes offer more underfoot cushioning, a rugged design and waterproof DryVent membranes, all of which make them perfect for hiking.

Product.Product_Name: Oboz - Sypes Mid Leather Waterproof - 8 Regular Cedar Brown
Product.Long_Description: Tracking Sypes Canyon Trail dust back into town, the Sypes Mid Leather Waterproof delivers light-hiker performance with an ACT Intelligent PU midsole that belies its laid-back looks. REPREVE materials and algae biomass lighten the environmental impact, while deep lugs tame trails both dirt and paved.

Product.Product_Name: Oboz - Womens Sypes Mid Leather WP - Slate 8.5 Regular
Product.Long_Description: The Womens Oboz Sypes shoes rock a mid-height cuff thatll lend plenty of freedom for all-day trail hiking. Its constructed with a B-Dry Waterproof nubuck leather thats breathable and will keep feet dry. Meanwhile, its construction below is comprised of materials that rebound, grip, and support you on every step taken in a breadth of terrain. The midsole in particular utilizes ACT Intelligent PU technology and an asymmetrical anatomical TPU heel clip. From rocky terrain to the pavement, the Oboz Sypess got the hardware to keep you going.

Product.Product_Name: Salewa - Womens Wildfire Leather - 10 Black/Fluo Coral
Product.Long_Description: The Salewa Wildfire Leather Womens Shoe is a comfortable technical approach shoe, with a versatile POMOCA Speed __MTN sole that offers greater grip, traction and climbing precision on technical mountain climbs, difficult climbs, crossings and ascents. It has a climbing area in the toe that provides greater performance on the edges. And the OrthoLite cushioning sole wicks away moisture, helping to keep your feet cool and dry.
Product.Google_Categorization: Apparel & Accessories > Shoes > Outdoor Shoes > Hiking Shoes

Product.Product_Name: The North Face - Mens Oxeye - 12 TNF Black/TNF Black
Product.Long_Description: Versatile, lightweight, and trail-capable, the North Face Mens Oxeye Shoes will be your new go-to everyday hikers. An innovative design allows these shoes to go off the trail and into the city.

Product.Product_Name: Salewa - Mens Mtn Trainer Lite - 9 Malta/Fluo Green
Product.Long_Description: The Mens Salewa MTN Trainer Lite is built to provide lightweight comfort, grip, and stability for alpine approach and mountain use. It has a robust fabric upper that fits well straight out of the box. The lasted construction and molded EVA midsole create a stiff midfoot with a flexible forefoot for moving quickly in rough terrain. This shoe is also engineered with our proprietary 3F system that connects the instep, sole, and heel for additional ankle support. The heel stabilizer and rubber toe cap also add further protection. Underfoot, the durable outsole has deep aggressive lugs to ensure reliable traction while the Pomoca compound rubber is grippy enough for scrambling both on wet and dry rock. The climbing lacing allows you to fine-tune right down to the toe for greater precision in technical rocky terrain. Designed in Italy, the mens MTN Trainer Lite is the perfect summer hiker with the technical pedigree for rugged, alpine use.

Product.Product_Name: Salewa - Womens Mtn Trainer Lite GTX - 9 Wallnut/Fluo Coral

Product.Product_Name: Salewa - Womens Mtn Trainer 2 GTX - 7 Dark Denim/Fluo Coral
Product.Long_Description: Comfortable, flexible and supportive the Salewa MTN Trainer 2 is a versatile low-cut alpine approach shoe with a high-quality 1.6-millimetre suede leather upper and a Vibram outsole. Inside, the waterproof GORE-TEX Extended Comfort membrane lets your feet breathe while protecting them from the elements and the soft textile lining fabric wicks moisture away for additional comfort. There is also a protective stretch gaiter under the laces to keep rain and groundwater out. Designed in Montebelluna, the cradle of alpine footwear craftsmanship, this shoe has a unique lasted construction that is 15% lighter than the original. The womens specific fit with contoured heel cups holds your feet comfortably in place and prevents slippage for more stability on descents. In addition, the expanded PU midsole provides long-lasting shock absorbency and rebound, helping decrease foot fatigue. Salewa also gives the high-quality upper a full 360 protective rubber rand for abrasion resistance and to protect your feet in rocky terrain. Underfoot, the multifunctional Vibram outsole gives agility and stability in rugged terrain. Its self-cleaning grooves and deep lugs guarantee a good grip on rock and scree and optimal traction on softer ground, such as mud or grass. It also benefits from a special via ferrata tread zone before the heel that ensures better grip on the iron ladder rungs of via ferratas. The womens MTN Trainer 2 also incorporates our proprietary 3F system for high flexibility, a more comfortable fit and greater support. With a cushioning OrthoLite foam footbed and climbing lacing that can be customized for technical terrain or casual use. The perfect solution for alpine trekking, scrambles, and approaches on a variety of surfaces and in all weather conditions.

Product.Product_Name: Salewa - Mens Wildfire Edge - 7 Java Blue/Black
Product.Long_Description: Salewas Wildfire Edge is a technical approach shoe that can be adapted from hiking mode to climbing mode. Designed together with mountain guides and top climbers in the Dolomites, the Salewa Switchfit system is as simple as it is smart. Simply tighten the laces at the rear eyelet and then do them up. This way, you pull your foot forward into the toebox, compressing your toes similar to a climbing shoe. Once youve finished climbing, loosen the laces at the rear eyelet for a roomier toebox and greater hiking comfort. To further enhance climbing precision, the Wildfire Edges insole also incorporates an Edging Plate right under the toes for additional, directional stiffness, while the rest of the insole remains flexible to ensure good comfort and a natural rolling motion.

Product.Product_Name: Salewa - Womens Mtn Trainer 2 GTX - 8 Black/Bungee Cord
Product.Long_Description: Comfortable, flexible and supportive the Salewa MTN Trainer 2 is a versatile low-cut alpine approach shoe with a high-quality 1.6-millimetre suede leather upper and a Vibram outsole. Inside, the waterproof GORE-TEX Extended Comfort membrane lets your feet breathe while protecting them from the elements and the soft textile lining fabric wicks moisture away for additional comfort. There is also a protective stretch gaiter under the laces to keep rain and groundwater out. Designed in Montebelluna, the cradle of alpine footwear craftsmanship, this shoe has a unique lasted construction that is 15% lighter than the original. The womens specific fit with contoured heel cups holds your feet comfortably in place and prevents slippage for more stability on descents. In addition, the expanded PU midsole provides long-lasting shock absorbency and rebound, helping decrease foot fatigue. Salewa also gives the high-quality upper a full 360 protective rubber rand for abrasion resistance and to protect your feet in rocky terrain. Underfoot, the multifunctional Vibram outsole gives agility and stability in rugged terrain. Its self-cleaning grooves and deep lugs guarantee a good grip on rock and scree and optimal traction on softer ground, such as mud or grass. It also benefits from a special via ferrata tread zone before the heel that ensures better grip on the iron ladder rungs of via ferratas. The womens MTN Trainer 2 also incorporates our proprietary 3F system for high flexibility, a more comfortable fit and greater support. With a cushioning OrthoLite foam footbed and climbing lacing that can be customized for technical terrain or casual use. The perfect solution for alpine trekking, scrambles, and approaches on a variety of surfaces and in all weather conditions.

During movement, the S-Path design of the sole enables a more natural roll-off and smoother heel-to-toe transition. In addition, the customizable SALEWA Multi Fit Footbed Plus (MFF+) has interchangeable layers that allow you to further fine-tune the inner volume of your shoes. The Dropline Leather is an agile and comfortable shoe with a speed hiking spec with great cushioning and support, for versatile hiking activities.

Product.Product_Name: Salewa - Mens Wildfire Edge - 8.5 Wallnut/Fluo Orange
Product.Long_Description: Salewas Wildfire Edge is a technical approach shoe that can be adapted from hiking mode to climbing mode. Designed together with mountain guides and top climbers in the Dolomites, the Salewa Switchfit system is as simple as it is smart. Simply tighten the laces at the rear eyelet and then do them up. This way, you pull your foot forward into the toebox, compressing your toes similar to a climbing shoe. Once youve finished climbing, loosen the laces at the rear eyelet for a roomier toebox and greater hiking comfort. To further enhance climbing precision, the Wildfire Edges insole also incorporates an Edging Plate right under the toes for additional, directional stiffness, while the rest of the insole remains flexible to ensure good comfort and a natural rolling motion.

Product.Product_Name: Salewa - Womens Ultra Train 3 - 7.5 Duck Green/Rhododendon
Product.Long_Description: The Ultra Train 3 is the third generation of Salewas successful speed hiking shoe, specifically designed for speed hiking and fast-moving, lighter mountain-based activities. Its built with a wrapping upper made of seamless mesh fabric for advanced breathability. At critical wear zones, the upper is reinforced with TPU film. Motion Guidance technology in the sole and midsole combine to promote natural movement and support surefooted stability over any terrain. Flexibility, a precise fit and good support all come courtesy of the functional 3F system, while the Anti-Rock Heel Cup fixes the heel firmly in place for extra stability and protection. The POMOCA outsole was developed exclusively with SALEWA and performs well both on rock and on wet and slippery surfaces.

Product.Product_Name: Salewa - Womens Mtn Trainer Lite Mid GTX - 7 Premium Navy/Blue Fog
Product.Long_Description: Made for alpine hiking and long backpacking routes our lightweight, comfortably fitting womens mid-cut shoe has a GORE-TEX membrane for durable waterproof protection without sacrificing breathability. The MTN Trainer Lite Mid is a comfortable and supportive mid-cut, 3-season boot that performs well on rock and technical terrain. Carrying more weight, means expending more energy. We strip the weight right down here by using a lightweight, but highly wear-resistant, fabric upper with suede inserts. The waterproof, breathable GORE-TEX Extended Comfort lining also makes it ideal for 3-season, alpine use from higher activity levels in summer to rain, mud or lingering snow. The fit is what sets any boot apart. Our lasted mid-cut boot construction allows enough space to comfortably accommodate your toes, whilst ensuring all-day comfort and support with the right amount of flex. Inside the heart of the shoe, the EVA midsole delivers good shock absorbency and rebound. For additional stability and protection, there is a forgiving ankle cuff, a heel stabilizer and a rubber toe cap. Underfoot, the outsole guarantees reliable grip thanks to the Pomoca compound rubber and tread pattern with deep lugs and grooves and the versatility to cope with a wide range of terrain from mud and grass to rock, ice and snow. The climbing lacing, which runs right down to the toe, allows easy customisation for greater precision in technical terrain or more relaxed wear. Our womens MTN Trainer Lite Mid is a lighter mid-top, 3-season alpine footwear solution for long-distance hikers and backpackers who want to shed weight from their feet but are not prepared to compromise on water resistance and comfort.

Product.Product_Name: Salewa - Womens Mtn Trainer Lite - 8 Premium Navy/Fluo Coral
Product.Long_Description: The Womens Salewa MTN Trainer Lite is built to provide lightweight comfort, grip, and stability for alpine approach and mountain use. It has a robust fabric upper that fits well straight out of the box. The lasted construction and molded EVA midsole create a stiff midfoot with a flexible forefoot for moving quickly in rough terrain. This shoe is also engineered with our proprietary 3F system that connects the instep, sole, and heel for additional ankle support. The heel stabilizer and rubber toe cap also add further protection. Underfoot, the durable outsole has deep aggressive lugs to ensure reliable traction while the Pomoca compound rubber is grippy enough for scrambling both on wet and dry rock. The climbing lacing allows you to fine-tune right down to the toe for greater precision in technical rocky terrain. Designed in Italy, the womens MTN Trainer Lite is the perfect summer hiker with the technical pedigree for rugged, alpine use.

Product.Product_Name: Oboz - Mens Katabatic Low Waterproof - 8.5 Regular Black Sea

Product.Product_Name: Hoka - W Anacapa 2 Low Gtx - 7 Regular Smoky Quartz / Cosmic Pearl
Product.Long_Description: Scrutinized through the lens of sustainability, Hoka has reimagined the beloved Anacapa Low GORE-TEX with a renewed focus on earth-friendly materials. Updated with recycled yarn meshes, Hoka enlisted GORE-TEX Invisible Fit technology, a 30% sugarcane EVA midsole, and a Vibram Megagrip outsole. Finished with metal eyelets and an abrasion resistant toe cap, theres no telling where this hiker will take you.

Product.Product_Name: Salewa - Ms Dropline Leather - 10 Autumnal/Black
Product.Long_Description: The Salewa Dropline Leather is a highly comfortable shoe that is designed for versatile use, from everyday use to speed hiking activitiesThe upper is made in a high-quality, soft, and robust 1.4-millimeter suede leather. It is reinforced with a PU rand for impact protection and to prevent scratches. The 3F system with nylon-coated Kevlar cables provides additional support while ensuring a precise fit and enhanced stability. At the tongue, a stretch mesh gaiter keeps out trail debris, such as grit and gravel. The Dropline Leather is built on a high-performance EVA midsole to offer optimum impact cushioning giving you a softer landing to enjoy longer activities. Underfoot, the self-cleaning POMOCA outsole performs well, offering solid, reliable grip and good traction with self-cleaning lugs. During movement, the S-Path design of the sole enables a more natural roll-off and smoother heel-to-toe transition. In addition, the customizable SALEWA Multi Fit Footbed Plus (MFF+) has interchangeable layers that allow you to further fine-tune the inner volume of your shoes. The Dropline Leather is an agile and comfortable shoe with a speed hiking spec with great cushioning and support, for versatile hiking activities.

Product.Product_Name: Oboz - Mens Sawtooth X Low Waterproof - 8 Regular Sediment
Product.Long_Description: Get rockin and get rollin with the Mens Sawtooth X Low Waterproof trail shoes. Its the Oboz answer to those looking for low-rise, supportive footwear. All the boxes that make this brand a powerhouse in the outdoor market are checked. B-Dry tech for breathability and water protection, adaptive Cushioning Technology for comfort, CORDURA AFT fabrics for durability, and an outsole thats got the tread to resist slips and grip terrain. Woven together like a fine tapestry, the features make for a brilliant boot thatll take you places near and far.

Product.Product_Name: Danner - Womens Jag - 9.5 Bungee Cord/Coffee Bean
Product.Long_Description: The original Danner Jag debuted in the 1980s as a lightweight alternative to their classic, heavy-duty hiking boots. After a few years on the trail supporting external frame backpacks and complementing denim cut-offs, the Jag was retired. Now 30 years later, Danner has reintroduced the Jag as a more versatile version of its former self. Its comfortable both on the trail and around town, and incorporates durable, lightweight materials, a cushioning EVA midsole, and a new waffle outsole that adapts to a wide variety of terrain. Danner is proud to reintroduce this original.

Product.Product_Name: Salewa - Womens Mtn Trainer 2 GTX - 6 Black/Bungee Cord
Product.Long_Description: Comfortable, flexible and supportive the Salewa MTN Trainer 2 is a versatile low-cut alpine approach shoe with a high-quality 1.6-millimetre suede leather upper and a Vibram outsole. Inside, the waterproof GORE-TEX Extended Comfort membrane lets your feet breathe while protecting them from the elements and the soft textile lining fabric wicks moisture away for additional comfort. There is also a protective stretch gaiter under the laces to keep rain and groundwater out. Designed in Montebelluna, the cradle of alpine footwear craftsmanship, this shoe has a unique lasted construction that is 15% lighter than the original. The womens specific fit with contoured heel cups holds your feet comfortably in place and prevents slippage for more stability on descents. In addition, the expanded PU midsole provides long-lasting shock absorbency and rebound, helping decrease foot fatigue. Salewa also gives the high-quality upper a full 360 protective rubber rand for abrasion resistance and to protect your feet in rocky terrain. Underfoot, the multifunctional Vibram outsole gives agility and stability in rugged terrain. Its self-cleaning grooves and deep lugs guarantee a good grip on rock and scree and optimal traction on softer ground, such as mud or grass. It also benefits from a special via ferrata tread zone before the heel that ensures better grip on the iron ladder rungs of via ferratas. The womens MTN Trainer 2 also incorporates our proprietary 3F system for high flexibility, a more comfortable fit and greater support. With a cushioning OrthoLite foam footbed and climbing lacing that can be customized for technical terrain or casual use. The perfect solution for alpine trekking, scrambles, and approaches on a variety of surfaces and in all weather conditions.

Putting the literal spring in your step, Mammut Flextron technology uses a spring-steel sole to provide effective shock absorption, energy transfer, and stability to support your natural stride. Meanwhile, reliable grip is provided by the Vibram outersole and a trusted GORE-TEX membrane keeps you protected from adverse weather. All this in an anatomically tailored design for a comfortable, precise fit.

Product.Product_Name: Oboz - Womens Sypes Low Leather WP - Peppercorn 10 Regular
Product.Long_Description: Low-profile, lightweight and stylish enough to take you from the trailhead to your favorite watering hole and everywhere in between. Product.Product_Name: Mammut - Sertig II Mid GTX Women - 6.5 Dark Titanium/Light Gentian
Product.Long_Description: Step into comfort with a lightweight and versatile mid-cut shoe. Pairing a Mammut Swiss Design sole for reliable grip with an EVA midsole and high stack height for cushioning and shock absorption, its a great partner for mixed terrain. Keeping it breezy with a breathable mesh outer fabric, its waterproof GORE-TEX membrane has you covered in less-than-ideal conditions. For great comfort at a minimal weight, the clear choice is Sertig.

Product.Google_Categorization: Apparel & Accessories > Shoes > Outdoor Shoes > Hiking Shoes

Product.Product_Name: The North Face - Mens Altamesa 500 - 11 TNF Black/Asphalt Grey
Product.Long_Description: Designed in collaboration with The North Face athlete team, the Mens Altamesa 500 are highly cushioned and stable performance training shoes for trail running. They feature TNFs DREAM midsole foam for a soft and light feel and trail-tuned SURFACE CTRL rubber outsoles, so youll be ready whether youre running on gravel paths or mountains trails.

Product.Product_Name: La Sportiva - Wildcat 2.0 Gtx Womens - 38 Regular Jungle/Cobalt Blue
Product.Long_Description: The Wildcat 2.0 GTX is a highly stable, neutral trail runner that provides excellent cushioning and a secure fit. The waterproof ePE Gore-Tex lining keeps your feet dry in wet conditions, and the aggressive outsole and supple midsole combine to ensure comfort and stability on rough trails.

Product.Product_Name: Salewa - Mens Wildfire GTX - 11.5 Black out/Silver
Product.Long_Description: The Salewa Wildfire GTX is a comfortable tech approach shoe, equipped with a versatile POMOCA Speed MTN sole for grip, traction, and sure-footed climbing precision on technical mountain approaches, scrambles, traverses, and climbs. It has a climbing zone at the toe and ensures good edging performance. Its POMOCA Butylic compound rubber provides a better grip on rock in both dry and wet conditions, while the aggressive tread lugs offer improved traction on mud and softer terrain. Salewa makes the precise-fitting upper from robust mesh and gives it an EXA Shell technology-injected 3D cage for enhanced torsional stability. It works together with their 3F system to wrap your foot for flexibility, fit, and firm ankle and heel support. To cope with wet conditions, the Wildfire GTX has a GORE-TEX Extended Comfort lining to provide waterproof and breathable protection. Climbing lacing further supports the wrapping fit, especially at the forefoot, and allows you to fine-tune the toe for greater precision in technical terrain. Inside, the breathable OrthoLite footbed provides superior cushioning and wicks away moisture, helping to keep your feet cooler and drier.

Product.Product_Name: Oboz - Sypes Mid Leather Waterproof - 8.5 Regular Peppercorn
Product.Long_Description: The Womens Oboz Sypes shoes rock a mid-height cuff thatll lend plenty of freedom for all-day trail hiking. Its constructed with a B-Dry Waterproof nubuck leather thats breathable and will keep feet dry. Meanwhile, its construction below is comprised of materials that rebound, grip, and support you on every step taken in a breadth of terrain. The midsole in particular utilizes ACT Intelligent PU technology and an asymmetrical anatomical TPU heel clip. From rocky terrain to the pavement, the Oboz Sypess got the hardware to keep you going.

Product.Product_Name: Altra - Womens Olympus 5 Hike Mid GTX - 6.5 Regular Black/Gray
Product.Long_Description: With the ankle support you need and waterproof GORE-TEX product technology, which is guaranteed by GORE-TEX to keep you protected from the elements, the Olympus 5 Hike Mid GTX are your new favorite hikers, ready to keep discovering all day. According to Vibram, a grippy Vibram Megagrip outsole gives you unparalleled grip on wet or dry surfaces. Product.Product_Name: Oboz - Sawtooth X Low Waterproof - 15 Regular Sediment
Product.Long_Description: Get rockin and get rollin with the Mens Sawtooth X Low Waterproof trail shoes. Its the Oboz answer to those looking for low-rise, supportive footwear. All the boxes that make this brand a powerhouse in the outdoor market are checked. B-Dry tech for breathability and water protection, adaptive Cushioning Technology for comfort, CORDURA AFT fabrics for durability, and an outsole thats got the tread to resist slips and grip terrain. Woven together like a fine tapestry, the features make for a brilliant boot thatll take you places near and far.

Product.Product_Name: Salewa - Mens Mtn Trainer Lite - 8.5 Ombre Blue/Carrot
Product.Long_Description: The Mens Salewa MTN Trainer Lite is built to provide lightweight comfort, grip, and stability for alpine approach and mountain use. It has a robust fabric upper that fits well straight out of the box. The lasted construction and molded EVA midsole create a stiff midfoot with a flexible forefoot for moving quickly in rough terrain. This shoe is also engineered with our proprietary 3F system that connects the instep, sole, and heel for additional ankle support. The heel stabilizer and rubber toe cap also add further protection. Underfoot, the durable outsole has deep aggressive lugs to ensure reliable traction while the Pomoca compound rubber is grippy enough for scrambling both on wet and dry rock. The climbing lacing allows you to fine-tune right down to the toe for greater precision in technical rocky terrain. Designed in Italy, the mens MTN Trainer Lite is the perfect summer hiker with the technical pedigree for rugged, alpine use.

Product.Product_Name: Altra - Womens Lone Peak All-Wthr Mid 2 - 8 Regular Black
Product.Long_Description: Heavy hiking boots shouldnt tire you outthe adventure should! With the Altra Lone Peak All-Weather Mid 2, we combined the comfort of a trail runner with the support of a hiking boot, minus the bulk. Treat your feet to our roomy Original FootShape Fit and responsive yet soft Altra EGO midsole foam. With a grippy MaxTrac outsole, youre ready to conquer a thru-hike or hit your neighborhood dirt loop with confidence.

Product.Product_Name: Salewa - Womens Crow GTX - 8.5 Premium Navy/Ethernal Blue
Product.Long_Description: The Crow GTX is a versatile mountaineering boot with an abrasion-resistant fabric upper and waterproof GORE-TEX protection. Designed for mixed use on general alpine terrain and alpine trekking, the Crow GTX has a crampon-compatible Vibram New Mulaz sole for semi-automatic crampons that offers grip on rock and traction in mixed mountain terrain and snow. The GORE-TEX Performance Comfort lining delivers optimized climate comfort should the weather close in on you and theres a full rubber rand for protection against rock and scree. The Crow GTX integrates SALEWA technologies to offer the Alpine Fit 100% blister free guarantee: 3F System for firm ankle and heel support, Climbing system to ensure that it fits perfectly around your foot and Flex Collar for comfort during descents.

Product.Product_Name: LOWA - EXPLORER GTX MID WMNS - 8.5 - REGULAR - Anthracite/Turquoise

Product.Product_Name: Salewa - Wildfire Canvas Womens - 7 Onyx/Black

And the dual-density eco Ortholite footbed promotes superior cushioning and freshness. This shoe represents Salewas commitment to sustainable manufacturing. Product.Product_Name: The North Face - Womens Cragstone Leather WP - 11 Bipartisan Brown/Meld Grey

Product.Product_Name: Salewa - Womens Mtn Trainer 2 GTX - 10.5 Black/Bungee Cord
Product.Long_Description: Comfortable, flexible and supportive the Salewa MTN Trainer 2 is a versatile low-cut alpine approach shoe with a high-quality 1.6-millimetre suede leather upper and a Vibram outsole. Inside, the waterproof GORE-TEX Extended Comfort membrane lets your feet breathe while protecting them from the elements and the soft textile lining fabric wicks moisture away for additional comfort. There is also a protective stretch gaiter under the laces to keep rain and groundwater out. Designed in Montebelluna, the cradle of alpine footwear craftsmanship, this shoe has a unique lasted construction that is 15% lighter than the original. The womens specific fit with contoured heel cups holds your feet comfortably in place and prevents slippage for more stability on descents. In addition, the expanded PU midsole provides long-lasting shock absorbency and rebound, helping decrease foot fatigue. Salewa also gives the high-quality upper a full 360 protective rubber rand for abrasion resistance and to protect your feet in rocky terrain. Underfoot, the multifunctional Vibram outsole gives agility and stability in rugged terrain. Its self-cleaning grooves and deep lugs guarantee a good grip on rock and scree and optimal traction on softer ground, such as mud or grass. It also benefits from a special via ferrata tread zone before the heel that ensures better grip on the iron ladder rungs of via ferratas. The womens MTN Trainer 2 also incorporates our proprietary 3F system for high flexibility, a more comfortable fit and greater support. With a cushioning OrthoLite foam footbed and climbing lacing that can be customized for technical terrain or casual use. The perfect solution for alpine trekking, scrambles, and approaches on a variety of surfaces and in all weather conditions.

In the womens X-Ultra 4 Mid, this is backed up by Gore-Tex protection and a grippy outsole that powers through uphills and descents, so you can explore your freedom.

Product.Product_Name: Oboz - Sypes Mid Leather Waterproof - 11 Wide Peppercorn
Product.Long_Description: The Womens Oboz Sypes shoes rock a mid-height cuff thatll lend plenty of freedom for all-day trail hiking. Its constructed with a B-Dry Waterproof nubuck leather thats breathable and will keep feet dry. Meanwhile, its construction below is comprised of materials that rebound, grip, and support you on every step taken in a breadth of terrain. The midsole in particular utilizes ACT Intelligent PU technology and an asymmetrical anatomical TPU heel clip. From rocky terrain to the pavement, the Oboz Sypess got the hardware to keep you going.

Product.Product_Name: Xero Shoes - Xcursion Fusion - 12.5 Asphalt
Product.Long_Description: Stay dry in the mens Xero Shoes Xcursion Fusion WP waterproof hiking boots. Their natural fit, wide toe boxes, and flexible design let your feet bend and move naturally and engage with your world.
Product.Google_Categorization: Apparel & Accessories > Shoes > Outdoor Shoes > Hiking Shoes

Product.Product_Name: Salewa - Womens Wildfire Edge Mid GTX - 6.5 Poseidon/Grisaille
Product.Long_Description: Walk in, climb with precision, and walk out in comfort in different weather conditions and all in one shoe. The Wildfire Edge Mid GORE-TEX is a unique technical solution for alpinists, climbers and scramblers who want an approach shoe with enhanced climbing performance. Its based on the smart and simple Salewa Switchfit system that allows you to quickly adapt the fit from hiking to climbing, by offering compression at the toes similar to a climbing shoe.

Product.Product_Name: Salewa - Ms Wildfire Leather - 7.5 Raw Green/Black
Product.Long_Description: The Salewa Wildfire Leather Mens Shoe is a comfortable technical approach shoe, with a versatile POMOCA Speed __MTN sole that offers greater grip, traction and climbing precision on technical mountain climbs, difficult climbs, crossings and ascents. It has a climbing area in the toe that provides greater performance on the edges. And the OrthoLite cushioning sole wicks away moisture, helping to keep your feet cool and dry.

Product.Product_Name: Salewa - Womens Wildfire Leather - 8 Bungee Cord/Black
Product.Long_Description: The Salewa Wildfire Leather Womens Shoe is a comfortable technical approach shoe, with a versatile POMOCA Speed __MTN sole that offers greater grip, traction and climbing precision on technical mountain climbs, difficult climbs, crossings and ascents. It has a climbing area in the toe that provides greater performance on the edges. And the OrthoLite cushioning sole wicks away moisture, helping to keep your feet cool and dry.
Product.Google_Categorization: Apparel & Accessories > Shoes > Outdoor Shoes > Hiking Shoes

Product.Product_Name: Oboz - Sypes Mid Leather Waterproof - 8 Wide Gunmetal
Product.Long_Description: Tracking Sypes Canyon Trail dust back into town, the Sypes Mid Leather Waterproof delivers light-hiker performance with an ACT Intelligent PU midsole that belies its laid-back looks. REPREVE materials and algae biomass lighten the environmental impact, while deep lugs tame trails both dirt and paved.

Product.Product_Name: Salewa - Dropline Leather - 7 Bungee Cord/Black
Product.Long_Description: The Salewa Dropline Leather is a highly comfortable shoe that is designed for versatile use, from everyday use to speed hiking activitiesThe upper is made in a high-quality, soft, and robust 1.4-millimeter suede leather. It is reinforced with a PU rand for impact protection and to prevent scratches. The 3F system with nylon-coated Kevlar cables provides additional support while ensuring a precise fit and enhanced stability. At the tongue, a stretch mesh gaiter keeps out trail debris, such as grit and gravel. The Dropline Leather is built on a high-performance EVA midsole to offer optimum impact cushioning giving you a softer landing to enjoy longer activities. Underfoot, the self-cleaning POMOCA outsole performs well, offering solid, reliable grip and good traction with self-cleaning lugs. During movement, the S-Path design of the sole enables a more natural roll-off and smoother heel-to-toe transition. In addition, the customizable SALEWA Multi Fit Footbed Plus (MFF+) has interchangeable layers that allow you to further fine-tune the inner volume of your shoes. The Dropline Leather is an agile and comfortable shoe with a speed hiking spec with great cushioning and support, for versatile hiking activities.

Product.Product_Name: Salewa - Wildfire 2 GTX Mens - 11.5 Fluo Orange/Black
Product.Long_Description: The Dolomites have so many classic climbs, sometimes its hard to know where to start: Tre Cime, Marmolada, Cinque Torri, Vajolet Towers, Tofana di Rozes...Salewa makes the Wildfire 2s precise-fitting upper from robust, recycled mesh and reinforces it with a network of Kevlar cables that wraps the foot for flexibility, fit-enhanced torsional stability, and heel support. Whats more, the Wildfire 2 switches quickly and easily from hiking mode to climbing mode using the SALEWA Switchfit adjustment system. The result: better edging and smearing and overall security on technical terrain. Moreover, the Multi Fit Footbed Plus (MFF+) provides a customizable fit, for a more narrow or wider comfort. To cope with tougher weather, the Wildfire GTX has a GORE-TEX Extended Comfort lining to provide waterproof and breathable protection. The Pomoca Speed MTN outsole has a climbing zone at the toe and aggressive tread lugs for good traction on mud and softer terrain, while its S-Path technology ensures a more natural roll-off. And the sticky POMOCA rubber provides good friction in both dry and wet conditions.

Product.Product_Name: Black Diamond - Missn Lthr Mid Wp Apch Shoes - 10 Walnuts-Octane
Product.Long_Description: Built for the long haul, Black Diamonds Mission Leather Mid WP is an approach shoe that provides ankle protection and support when heading into the hills with heavy packs and big objectives on the horizon. Featuring a waterproof/breathable BD.dry lining combined with a high-grade Nubuck leather upper, the Mission Leather Mid WP keeps you dry while moving through stream crossings and snowfields. The padded ankle provides protection through scree fields and rocky terrain; and the climbing forefoot and toecap construction, which features our BlackLabel-Mountain sticky rubber add precision when the trail kicks up into a scramble. Deep, high traction lugs provide grip in mud, and the fully gusseted tongue is padded for maximum comfort while keeping dirt and debris out. A tuned EVA midsole provides ample stiffness and precision when aiding through vertical terrain or Via Ferratas, and multiple webbing loops give you tagging options when the approach ends and the climbing begins.
Product.Google_Categorization: Apparel & Accessories > Shoes > Outdoor Shoes > Hiking Shoes

Product.Product_Name: Salewa - Womens Mtn Trainer 2 GTX - 8.5 Black/Bungee Cord
Product.Long_Description: Comfortable, flexible and supportive the Salewa MTN Trainer 2 is a versatile low-cut alpine approach shoe with a high-quality 1.6-millimetre suede leather upper and a Vibram outsole. Inside, the waterproof GORE-TEX Extended Comfort membrane lets your feet breathe while protecting them from the elements and the soft textile lining fabric wicks moisture away for additional comfort. There is also a protective stretch gaiter under the laces to keep rain and groundwater out. Designed in Montebelluna, the cradle of alpine footwear craftsmanship, this shoe has a unique lasted construction that is 15% lighter than the original. The womens specific fit with contoured heel cups holds your feet comfortably in place and prevents slippage for more stability on descents. In addition, the expanded PU midsole provides long-lasting shock absorbency and rebound, helping decrease foot fatigue. Salewa also gives the high-quality upper a full 360 protective rubber rand for abrasion resistance and to protect your feet in rocky terrain. Underfoot, the multifunctional Vibram outsole gives agility and stability in rugged terrain. Its self-cleaning grooves and deep lugs guarantee a good grip on rock and scree and optimal traction on softer ground, such as mud or grass. It also benefits from a special via ferrata tread zone before the heel that ensures better grip on the iron ladder rungs of via ferratas. The womens MTN Trainer 2 also incorporates our proprietary 3F system for high flexibility, a more comfortable fit and greater support. With a cushioning OrthoLite foam footbed and climbing lacing that can be customized for technical terrain or casual use. The perfect solution for alpine trekking, scrambles, and approaches on a variety of surfaces and in all weather conditions.
Product.Google_Categorization: Apparel & Accessories > Shoes > Outdoor Shoes > Hiking Shoes

Product.Product_Name: Salewa - Womens Mtn Trainer Lite - 8.5 Premium Navy/Fluo Coral
Product.Long_Description: The Womens Salewa MTN Trainer Lite is built to provide lightweight comfort, grip, and stability for alpine approach and mountain use. It has a robust fabric upper that fits well straight out of the box. The lasted construction and molded EVA midsole create a stiff midfoot with a flexible forefoot for moving quickly in rough terrain. This shoe is also engineered with our proprietary 3F system that connects the instep, sole, and heel for additional ankle support. The heel stabilizer and rubber toe cap also add further protection. Underfoot, the durable outsole has deep aggressive lugs to ensure reliable traction while the Pomoca compound rubber is grippy enough for scrambling both on wet and dry rock. The climbing lacing allows you to fine-tune right down to the toe for greater precision in technical rocky terrain. Designed in Italy, the womens MTN Trainer Lite is the perfect summer hiker with the technical pedigree for rugged, alpine use.
Product.Google_Categorization: Apparel & Accessories > Shoes > Outdoor Shoes > Hiking Shoes

Product.Product_Name: BLACK DIAMOND - CIRCUIT W - 8.5 - Bordeaux Gum
Product.Long_Description: Engineered for ultimate comfort, the Black Diamond Womens Circuit is stylistically sharp, super sticky, and ultra-durable, making for a performance lifestyle shoe thats equally at home at the gym, crag, or bar. Featuring a breathable knit upper for temperature control and a low-rise, collapsible heal that can easily flip down for a slip-on feel, the Circuit can also handle approaches thanks to its BlackLabel-Street sticky rubber outsole. Rubber toe protection adds security, and the webbing loops allow for various tagging and stowing options for when the trail ends and the climbing begins.
Product.Google_Categorization: Apparel & Accessories > Shoes > Outdoor Shoes > Hiking Shoes

Product.Product_Name: Oboz - Womens Sawtooth X Mid WP - Rockfall 12 Regular
Product.Long_Description: Mid-cuff profile with high bar performance, the Womens Oboz Sawtooth Xs got all the elements for getting you from A to B in comfort. Made for the trail in all seasons, it keeps the elements at bay and feet dry with a breathable, waterproof B-Dry system tailored throughout the upper. The midsoles able to soften every footfall and adapt to varying terrain with the aid of proprietary rubberized EVA. Underneath is an outsole thats slip-resistant and can put up with all the rough n tumble expected of outdoor routes. Whatever your speed, expect the Sawtooth X to keep momentum in your corner.

Product.Product_Name: Oboz - Mens Sawtooth X Low Waterproof - Canteen 8.5 Regular
Product.Long_Description: Get rockin and get rollin with the Mens Sawtooth X Low Waterproof trail shoes. Its the Oboz answer to those looking for low-rise, supportive footwear. All the boxes that make this brand a powerhouse in the outdoor market are checked. B-Dry tech for breathability and water protection, adaptive Cushioning Technology for comfort, CORDURA AFT fabrics for durability, and an outsole thats got the tread to resist slips and grip terrain. Woven together like a fine tapestry, the features make for a brilliant boot thatll take you places near and far.

Product.Product_Name: BLACK DIAMOND - PRIME SHOES W - 7.5 - Birch-Mulberry
Product.Long_Description: Engineered for ultimate comfort without sacrificing durability, the Prime features a suede upper that allows for an adaptable fit while providing added weather resistance and comfort. Product.Product_Name: Mammut - Ducan High GTX Women - 7 Dark Steel-Neo Mint
Product.Long_Description: From short hikes to multi-day tours, Mammuts Ducan High GTX for women keeps all your options open and is backed by the latest technologies to do so. Putting the literal spring in your step, Mammut Flextrontechnology uses a spring-steel sole to provide effective shock absorption, energy transfer, and stability to support your natural stride. Product.Product_Name: Oboz - Mens Sawtooth X Low - 9 Regular Sandhill
Product.Long_Description: Ten years ago, the Sawtooth put Oboz on the map in outdoor footwear. The new Sawtooth X retains all the things that made the original so popular with the addition of new aggressive styling and new materials like our Adaptive Cushioning Technology midsoleall you need to map out your next adventure.

Product.Product_Name: SALEWA - WILDFIRE EDGE M - 10 - Wallnut/Fluo Orange
Product.Long_Description: Salewas Wildfire Edge is a technical approach shoe that can be adapted from hiking mode to climbing mode. Designed together with mountain guides and top climbers in the Dolomites, the Salewa Switchfit system is as simple as it is smart. Simply tighten the laces at the rear eyelet and then do them up. This way, you pull your foot forward into the toebox, compressing your toes similar to a climbing shoe. Once youve finished climbing, loosen the laces at the rear eyelet for a roomier toebox and greater hiking comfort. To further enhance climbing precision, the Wildfire Edges insole also incorporates an Edging Plate right under the toes for additional, directional stiffness, while the rest of the insole remains flexible to ensure good comfort and a natural rolling motion.

Product.Product_Name: Oboz - Mens Sypes Low Leather WP - Steel 7 Regular
Product.Long_Description: The Oboz Mens Waterproof Sypes Low Leather is low-profile, lightweight, and stylish enough to take you from the trailhead to your favorite watering hole and everywhere in between. Designed for maximum support, comfort, and versatility, and built with sustainable materials and B-DRY Waterproofing, so you can feel good every step of the way.

Product.Product_Name: Oboz - Womens Sawtooth X Low Waterproof - 5 Regular Lupine
Product.Long_Description: Ride like the wind over the ebb and flow of nature in the Oboz Womens Sawtooth X. Low-rise, supportive trail shoes that have all the features of high-performance footwear. Its waterproof and breathable construction comes courtesy of B-Dry technology. Proprietary rubberized EVA found in the midsole means you get from A to B in comfort no matter the topography. And the outsole is able to grip terrain and mitigate slippage. The end result? A boot thatll keep you dry and comfortable throughout your hikes over trails less traveled.

Product.Product_Name: Oboz - Katabatic Low Waterproof - 6.5 Regular Black Sea
Product.Long_Description: Speed is your friend with the Katabatic, as is support, stability, protection, and performance. Product.Product_Name: Salewa - Womens Ultra Train 3 - 7 Duck Green/Rhododendon
Product.Long_Description: The Ultra Train 3 is the third generation of Salewas successful speed hiking shoe, specifically designed for speed hiking and fast-moving, lighter mountain-based activities. Its built with a wrapping upper made of seamless mesh fabric for advanced breathability. At critical wear zones, the upper is reinforced with TPU film. Product.Product_Name: Salewa - Wildfire 2 Kids - 11 Gold/Gold
Product.Long_Description: Engineered in the Dolomites for mountain adventures all over the world. Salewa designed the Wildfire 2 for budding mountaineers and outdoor explorers. Underfoot, the Pomoca Junior Hike outsole features a tread pattern designed for optimal grip and traction in varied terrain and weather conditions, while the S-Path guides the natural rolling motion of your childrens feet. Product.Product_Name: Salewa - Womens Mtn Trainer Lite - 10 Premium Navy/Fluo Coral
Product.Long_Description: The Womens Salewa MTN Trainer Lite is built to provide lightweight comfort, grip, and stability for alpine approach and mountain use. It has a robust fabric upper that fits well straight out of the box. The lasted construction and molded EVA midsole create a stiff midfoot with a flexible forefoot for moving quickly in rough terrain. This shoe is also engineered with our proprietary 3F system that connects the instep, sole, and heel for additional ankle support. The heel stabilizer and rubber toe cap also add further protection. Underfoot, the durable outsole has deep aggressive lugs to ensure reliable traction while the Pomoca compound rubber is grippy enough for scrambling both on wet and dry rock. The climbing lacing allows you to fine-tune right down to the toe for greater precision in technical rocky terrain. Designed in Italy, the womens MTN Trainer Lite is the perfect summer hiker with the technical pedigree for rugged, alpine use.

Product.Product_Name: The North Face - Womens Cragstone Leather WP - 9 Bipartisan Brown/Meld Grey

Product.Product_Name: Salewa - Womens Mtn Trainer 2 GTX - 6.5 Black/Bungee Cord
Product.Long_Description: Comfortable, flexible and supportive the Salewa MTN Trainer 2 is a versatile low-cut alpine approach shoe with a high-quality 1.6-millimetre suede leather upper and a Vibram outsole. Inside, the waterproof GORE-TEX Extended Comfort membrane lets your feet breathe while protecting them from the elements and the soft textile lining fabric wicks moisture away for additional comfort. There is also a protective stretch gaiter under the laces to keep rain and groundwater out. Designed in Montebelluna, the cradle of alpine footwear craftsmanship, this shoe has a unique lasted construction that is 15% lighter than the original. The womens specific fit with contoured heel cups holds your feet comfortably in place and prevents slippage for more stability on descents. In addition, the expanded PU midsole provides long-lasting shock absorbency and rebound, helping decrease foot fatigue. Salewa also gives the high-quality upper a full 360 protective rubber rand for abrasion resistance and to protect your feet in rocky terrain. Underfoot, the multifunctional Vibram outsole gives agility and stability in rugged terrain. Its self-cleaning grooves and deep lugs guarantee a good grip on rock and scree and optimal traction on softer ground, such as mud or grass. It also benefits from a special via ferrata tread zone before the heel that ensures better grip on the iron ladder rungs of via ferratas. The womens MTN Trainer 2 also incorporates our proprietary 3F system for high flexibility, a more comfortable fit and greater support. With a cushioning OrthoLite foam footbed and climbing lacing that can be customized for technical terrain or casual use. The perfect solution for alpine trekking, scrambles, and approaches on a variety of surfaces and in all weather conditions.

Product.Long_Description: The Salewa Wildfire is a comfortable tech approach shoe, equipped with a versatile POMOCA Speed Mtn sole for grip, traction and sure-footed climbing precision on technical mountain approaches, scrambles, traverses and climbs. It has a climbing zone at the toe and ensures good edging performance. Its POMOCA Butilic compound rubber provides better grip on rock in both dry and wet conditions, while the aggressive tread lugs offer improved traction on mud and softer terrain. They make the precise-fitting upper from robust mesh and give it an EXA Shell technology injected 3D cage for enhanced torsional stability. It works together with Salewas 3F system to wrap your foot for flexibility, fit and firm ankle and heel support. To cope with warmer conditions, the Wildfire has a breathable mesh lining. Climbing lacing further supports the wrapping fit, especially at the forefoot and allows you to fine-tune the toe for greater precision in technical terrain. Inside, the breathable OrthoLite footbed provides superior cushioning and wicks away moisture, helping to keep your feet cooler and drier.

Product.Product_Name: Oboz - Mens Sawtooth X Low Waterproof - Canteen 7 Regular
Product.Long_Description: Get rockin and get rollin with the Mens Sawtooth X Low Waterproof trail shoes. Its the Oboz answer to those looking for low-rise, supportive footwear. All the boxes that make this brand a powerhouse in the outdoor market are checked. B-Dry tech for breathability and water protection, adaptive Cushioning Technology for comfort, CORDURA AFT fabrics for durability, and an outsole thats got the tread to resist slips and grip terrain. Woven together like a fine tapestry, the features make for a brilliant boot thatll take you places near and far.

Product.Product_Name: Salewa - Womens Wildfire Leather - 11 Black/Fluo Coral
Product.Long_Description: The Salewa Wildfire Leather Womens Shoe is a comfortable technical approach shoe, with a versatile POMOCA Speed __MTN sole that offers greater grip, traction and climbing precision on technical mountain climbs, difficult climbs, crossings and ascents. It has a climbing area in the toe that provides greater performance on the edges. And the OrthoLite cushioning sole wicks away moisture, helping to keep your feet cool and dry.

Product.Product_Name: Oboz - Womens Jeannette Low - 5 Regular Black Sea
Product.Long_Description: A low-key color palette comes together with easy stretch lacing for a casual shoe that works as hard as you do. Named in honor of Montanas Jeannette Rankinthe first woman ever elected to U.S. Congress, in 1916the Oboz Jeannette brings together REPREVE recycled fibers with a suede outer and sturdy nubuck leather rand. Rough-out suede leather and deboss detailing round out the finish for a fine-tuned style that doesnt get left behind by function.

Product.Product_Name: The North Face - Mens Altamesa 500 - 9.5 Forest Olive/TNF Black
Product.Long_Description: Designed in collaboration with The North Face athlete team, the Mens Altamesa 500 are highly cushioned and stable performance training shoes for trail running. They feature TNFs DREAM midsole foam for a soft and light feel and trail-tuned SURFACE CTRL rubber outsoles, so youll be ready whether youre running on gravel paths or mountains trails.

Product.Long_Description: Stay dry in the mens Xero Shoes Xcursion Fusion WP waterproof hiking boots. Their natural fit, wide toe boxes, and flexible design let your feet bend and move naturally and engage with your world.
